T02TD1358E:94a-1: shr'i k'a la tsa kra s'a dha na n'a ma /
T02TD1358E:94a-3: dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba /
T02TD1358E:94a-4: bcom ldan 'das dang po'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1358E:94a-5: dpal ldan srid gsum mgon po mchog tu bde pa'i bdag nyid rnam par rtog pa ma lus rab tu spangs //
T02TD1358E:94a-6: spro dang sdud pa'i rgyur gyur dngos dang dngos med mnyam pa'i ye shes skye dang 'jig pa rnam par bral //
T02TD1358E:94a-7: skye bo rnams kyi bsam pa rnams la dgongs te hum yig la sogs las byung dkyil 'khor gyis ni bskor //
T02TD1358E:94a-8: bden pa dag la gnas pa'i mchog gi snying rje dang ldan dang po'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1358E:94a-9: 'jam pa'i dpal gyis bsdus rgyud du //
T02TD1358E:94a-10: sgrub thabs gsungs pa de bzhin du //
T02TD1358E:94a-12: de dag blangs te bri bar bya //
T02TD1358E:94a-13: bstan bcos brtsam pa'i nus med cing //
T02TD1358E:94a-14: mdzad las dbyung bar ma nus kyang //
T02TD1358E:94a-15: bsgom phyir sgrub thabs 'di byas pas //
T02TD1358E:94a-16: blo ldan rnams la bzod par gsol //
T02TD1358E:94a-17: dang por sngags pa mchog tu snying rje dang ldan pa gzhan gyi bya ba byed par 'dod pas /
T02TD1358E:94a-18: zhi ba la sogs pa las kyi bye brag gis /
T02TD1358E:94a-19: rgya mtsho'i 'gram la sogs pa'i gnas yid du 'ong ba'i bsam gtan gyi gnas su //
T02TD1358E:94b-1: de'i sras rnams la gus pas /
T02TD1358E:94b-2: bcom ldan 'das dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi bris sku la sogs pa bzhugs su gsol /
T02TD1358E:94b-4: mandala la sogs pa gzhung nas bshad pa ltar bshams la /
T02TD1358E:94b-5: 'jam pa la sogs pa'i stan la bsdad la /
T02TD1358E:94b-6: shin tu gus pa dang ldan pa'i rang gi yid kyis phyag btsal ba la sogs pa rnams dang /
T02TD1358E:94b-7: phyi'i mchod pa rgya chen po rnams dang mnyam por gzhag pa ste /
T02TD1358E:94b-8: ji ltar gsungs pa ltar dag par byas pa'i bdud rtsi lnga'i ri lu sran ma tsa na ka tsam khar bcug nas /
T02TD1358E:94b-12: ye shes rnam par dag par bya ba la sogs pa rnams bya ba ni /
T02TD1358E:94b-13: de yang mchog gi snying rje dang bdud rtsi'i dbang gis sems la brlan pa'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis dpal dri ma med par lha nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i don du lus dang ngag dang yid dang ye shes rnam par dag par gsungs pa /
T02TD1358E:94b-14: aom a'a: hum ho: ham ksha /
T02TD1358E:94b-15: pra dznyo p'a y'atam ka k'a ya waka tsitta dzny'ana badzram badzr'a badzr'a mri ta sv'a bh'a ba ku ru ku ru skandha dh'a tv'a ya t'a n'a ni /
T02TD1358E:94b-18: gtsug tor du bam yig yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje zla ba'i dkyil 'khor cha bcu drug pa yongs su rdzogs pa lta bu sngags pas bsam mo //
T02TD1358E:94b-19: de nas gtsug tor nas brtsams te sen mo'i bar gyi lus sbrul pags pa brjes pa ltar bsam mo //
T02TD1358E:94b-20: de ltar zhib dang rgyas pa dag la'o //
T02TD1358E:94b-21: dbang la sogs pa gzhung ches kyis dogs nas ma bris so //
T02TD1358E:94b-22: de nas yang de nyid gsungs pa'i //
T02TD1358E:94b-23: aom sv'a bh'a ba shuddh'a: sarba dharma'a: sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham /
T02TD1358E:94b-25: de nas dpral bar aom yig yongs su gyur pa las 'od dpag med sku mdog dkar po //
T02TD1358E:94b-26: mgrin par a'a: yig yongs su gyur pa las rin chen 'byung ldan sku mdog dmar po /
T02TD1358E:94b-27: snying gar hum yig yongs su gyur pa las don yod grub pa sku mdog nag po /
T02TD1358E:94b-28: lte bar ho: yig yongs su gyur pa las rnam par snang mdzad sku mdog ser po /
T02TD1358E:94b-29: gtsug tor du ham yig yongs su gyur pa las mi bskyod pa sku mdog ljang gu //
T02TD1358E:94b-30: gsang gnas su ksha: yig yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog sngon po rnams dgod pa ni /
T02TD1358E:95a-0: gsung bar 'gyur ba'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan rnams @95a * //
T02TD1358E:95a-2: 'di ni rdo rje'i zhal dag pa las rigs drug dgod pa'i nges pa'o //
T02TD1358E:95a-3: de nas lag pa dag pa'i sngags brjod do //
T02TD1358E:95a-4: aom hram: sarb'a sta r'a dza m'a ra kle shnta ka ra badzra t'i kshan du: kha tstshe da ma ma ka ram bi sho dha ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1358E:95a-5: zhes pa'i sngags 'di nyid kyis lag pa mnye ba ni lag ba dag pa'i nges pa'o //
T02TD1358E:95a-6: de nas aa la sogs pa'i la'i mthar thug pa'i dbyangs yig bco lnga ni /
T02TD1358E:95a-9: ha ya ra wa la rnams lag pa g-yon pa'i mthe'u chung gi rtsa ba'i tshigs nas brtsams te /
T02TD1358E:95a-10: mthe bo'i bar gyi tshigs rnams la nam mkha' la sogs pa dgod pa'o //
T02TD1358E:95a-11: de nas lag pa g-yas pa'i mthe bo'i steng gi tshigs nas brtsams te /
T02TD1358E:95a-12: mthe'u chung gi tshigs kyi bar du l'a yig la sogs ba dgod pa ni /
T02TD1358E:95a-14: a'a la aoo a'ar aee a'a:/
T02TD1358E:95a-16: rnams ni sa la sogs pa rim pa bzhin no //
T02TD1358E:95a-17: de nas thal mo sbyar ba'i nang du zla ba dang nyi ma'i dbus su hum yig kha dog sngon po bsam /
T02TD1358E:95a-18: yang de nyid du gsungs pa ltar zla ba dang nyi ma dang sgra gcan gyi sa bon dang ldan pas rtse lnga'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02TD1358E:95a-20: rkang pa'i sen mo'i bar du bdag nyid la reg par bya zhes sngags brjod la /
T02TD1358E:95a-21: aom a'a: hum ho: ham ksha: k'a ya b'a ka tsitta dzny'a n'a dhi pa ti badzra k'a ya b'a ka tsitta dzny'ana badzr'a badzr'a ka'a ya sva bh'a bam ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1358E:95a-22: de'i nga rgyal dang bcas pas /
T02TD1358E:95a-23: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra k'a ya b'a ka tsitta sva bh'a ba a'atam ko& ham /
T02TD1358E:95a-24: zhes pa ni lus dang ngag dang yid dang ye shes rnam par dg pa'o //
T02TD1358E:95a-25: de ltar rigs drug la dgod par byas nas /
T02TD1358E:95a-26: de nas yan lag drug la dgod pa ni /
T02TD1358E:95a-27: lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar ba'i mthe bo gnyis snying gar gtad de /
T02TD1358E:95a-28: aom hr'lim hri da y'a ya na ma:/
T02TD1358E:95a-30: mgrin par aom hum gr'i w'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02TD1358E:95a-32: mgo bor aom hr'um si ra se sv'a h'a /
T02TD1358E:95a-34: gtsug tor la aom hr'im shi kh'a yee boo sha ta /
T02TD1358E:95a-36: yan lag thams cad la aom hr'im ka ba ts'a ya hum zhes brjod cing lag pa gnyis kyis lus thams cad la reg par bya'o //
T02TD1358E:95a-37: mig la aom hr'am ne tr'a ya wa sha ta /
T02TD1358E:95a-39: mig la aom hr'a: aast'a ya phat /
T02TD1358E:95b-0: ces pas phyogs thams cad du mthe bong dang mdzub mos se gol gtogs shing dge ba'i bya ba @95b la g-yon gyis /
T02TD1358E:95b-1: mi dge ba'i bya ba la g-yas pas dgod do //
T02TD1358E:95b-2: de nas aom sarba ta th'a ga ta hri da ya tri wa si ra: shi kha ka ba tsa ni tra aa sta badzra sha d'am ga sv'a bh'a ba a'a tma ko& ham /
T02TD1358E:95b-3: zhes pa ni yan lag drug la dgod pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1358E:95b-4: de nas srung 'khor gyi don du nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su dang por 'khor lo bzhi bsgom pa ni /
T02TD1358E:95b-5: de nas de nyid du gsungs pa ltar srung ba'i 'khor lo rnam par bsam par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD1358E:95b-6: de yang dang por yam yig yongs su gyur pa las rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'og dang steng du hum yig yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje kha sbyor ro //
T02TD1358E:95b-7: de nas ram yig yongs su gyur pa las me'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02TD1358E:95b-8: wam yig yongs su gyur pa las chu'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02TD1358E:95b-9: lam yig yongs su gyur pa las sa'i dkyil 'khor rnam rim pa bzhin du /
T02TD1358E:95b-13: ser po rnams kyi 'og dang steng du hum yig yongs su gyur pa las rang rang gi kha dog dang bcas pa'i rdo rje gnyis dang bcas pa rnams /
T02TD1358E:95b-17: gru bzhi'i rnam pa la rlung yab dang bkra shis dang padma dang /
T02TD1358E:95b-18: 'khor lo rnams kyis spras pa go bar bya'o //
T02TD1358E:95b-19: de nas yang de nyid du gsungs pa ltar dkyil 'khor gzhi gcig tu gyur pa snga dro'i grib ma'i mtshams dang /
T02TD1358E:95b-21: phyi rol du nam mkha' dang sa gzhi 'dus par snang ba'i mtshams su ste /
T02TD1358E:95b-22: de yang dkyil 'khor gzhi gcig tu gyur pa khru bzhi brgya dang ldan pa'i gzhal yas khang bsgom pa dang /
T02TD1358E:95b-23: de ltar rab gsum bsgom pa dang /
T02TD1358E:95b-24: de ltar grong khyer srung ba'i don du grong khyer gyi mtshams su ra ba lnga bsgom par bya ba dang /
T02TD1358E:95b-25: de ltar 'og thams cad du rdo rje'i mdung dang /
T02TD1358E:95b-26: steng du mda'i dra ba shin tu rno ba dang /
T02TD1358E:95b-27: dbus su rdo rje'i sa gzhi rnams grong khyer gyi mtshams su bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1358E:95b-28: de nas gzhal yas khang gi dbus su padm'a /
T02TD1358E:95b-29: 'khor lo khru bcu gnyis pa mu khyud dang bcas pa 'dab ma brgyad pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1358E:95b-30: dbus kyi lte ba khru bzhi dang ldan pa'i nyi ma dang bcas pa'i gdan no //
T02TD1358E:95b-31: 'on kyang 'di bye brag ni hum yig yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang /
T02TD1358E:95b-32: aom yig yongs su gyur pa las sam /
T02TD1358E:95b-33: bhr'um yig yongs su gyur pa las gzhal yas khang /
T02TD1358E:95b-34: bam yig yongs su gyur pa'am /
T02TD1358E:96a-2: ram yig yongs su gyur pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms zhes bya'o //
T02TD1358E:96a-3: de ltar ra ba la sogs pa bsgoms nas /
T02TD1358E:96a-4: yang de nyid du gsungs pa ltar sngags kyi bye brag tu gyur pa 'di lta ste /
T02TD1358E:96a-5: aom a'a: h'um ra: badzra tsamdra s'u rya r'a hu k'a la aagne ya /
T02TD1358E:96a-6: k'a ya b'a ka tsitta dzny'a na badzra badzra pr'a k'a r'an ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1358E:96a-7: zhes pa ni ra ba'i sngags so //
T02TD1358E:96a-8: aom bhr'um bi shva k'a ya badzra k'u t'a g'a ram ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1358E:96a-9: zhes pa ni gzhal yas khang gi sngags so //
T02TD1358E:96a-10: aom pa: bi shva badzra padmam ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1358E:96a-11: zhes pa ni padma'i sngags so //
T02TD1358E:96a-12: aom ra: badzra s'u ry'a sa nam ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1358E:96a-13: zhes pa ni nyi ma'i gdan gyi sngags so //
T02TD1358E:96a-14: de nas de'i steng du aam yig dkar po yongs su gyur pa las /
T02TD1358E:96a-15: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin /
T02TD1358E:96a-16: ka yig la sogs pa gsal byed 'dus pa'i bdag nyid las /
T02TD1358E:96a-17: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pa me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin no //
T02TD1358E:96a-18: yang de nyid du gsungs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid g-yon dang g-yas su bskor ba /
T02TD1358E:96a-19: dbyangs yi gsum cu a'a: tsheg drag dang klad kor dang bcas pa bsgom pa ni /
T02TD1358E:96a-20: aa ai ri au li 'di rnams ni dang po lnga bsdus pa'o //
T02TD1358E:96a-21: de yang yon tan gyi dbye bas aa ae aar ao aal rnams ni gnyis pa lnga rnams bsdus pa'o //
T02TD1358E:96a-22: de nas rkyen gyis gyur pa ha ya ra wa la rnams ni gsum pa'i bsdus pa lnga'o //
T02TD1358E:96a-23: bsdus pa bco lnga'i mthar thig le ni aam yig sta /
T02TD1358E:96a-25: 'di rnams ni g-yon skor gyis so //
T02TD1358E:96a-26: de nas g-yas skor gyis nag po'i phyogs kyi dang po la sogs pa dgod pa /
T02TD1358E:96a-28: a'a la aoo a'ar aee a'a: l'i a'u r'i a'i a'a /
T02TD1358E:96a-29: de ltar bco lnga dang gnam stong gi mthar tsheg drag ni a'a a'a: ste /
T02TD1358E:96a-30: 'di ni de ltar dbyangs yig bcu drug ces bya'o //
T02TD1358E:96a-31: de nas de'i steng du a'a: yig dmar po yongs su gyur pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin du bu mo'i bdag nyid bsam mo //
T02TD1358E:96a-32: yang de nyid du gsungs pa'i ka yig la sogs pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gsal byed bzhi bcu'i bdag nyid de yang /
T02TD1358E:96a-33: ha ya ra wa la rnams dang /
T02TD1358E:96a-34: sde tshan drug ste sum cu rtsa lnga dang /
T02TD1358E:96b-0: de nyid kyis brjod pa'i la wa ya dadha rnams bzung @96b ste ;
T02TD1358E:96b-1: lla wba dda dhdha lla wwa rra yya hha ssa wwa shsha shasha thka thka /
T02TD1358E:96b-6: kka khkha gga ghgha ngnga rnams te /
T02TD1358E:96b-7: bzhi bcu thams pa sa la sogs pa'i dbye bas g-yas skor gyis so //
T02TD1358E:96b-14: thka sha sha wa sa ha ya ra wa la dha da ya wa la ste /
T02TD1358E:96b-15: de ltar bzhi bcu ste gsal byed brgyad cu zhes so //
T02TD1358E:96b-16: de nas de dag gi dbus su h'um yig sngon po las byung ba'i sna tshogs rdo rje h'um gis mtshan pa so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1358E:96b-17: de nas gnas gsum po gcig tu 'dres pa la hr'i: yig gis spras pa las bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1358E:96b-18: de nas lus kyi yan lag thams cad rdzogs pa ham yig gi bdag nyid chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin 'og nas phyag 'tshal ba'i skabs su 'chad pa'i dpal dus kyi 'khor lo ste /
T02TD1358E:96b-19: 'on kyang phyag nyi shu rtsa drug pa phyag lhag ma gnyis kyis glang po che'i pags pa 'dzin pa la kha dog ser po zhabs brkyang bskum du bzhugs pa /
T02TD1358E:96b-20: zhal gcig ma spyan gsum ma /
T02TD1358E:96b-21: phyag gnyis kyis gri gug dang thod pa bsnams pa /
T02TD1358E:96b-22: phyag rgya lngas spras pa'i sna tshogs yum gyis mgul nas 'khyud pa /
T02TD1358E:96b-23: sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
T02TD1358E:96b-24: stag gi sham thabs sbyangs pa /
T02TD1358E:96b-25: khro bo'i dbang po rdo rje shugs su bdag nyid bsgom mo //
T02TD1358E:96b-26: yang de nyid du gsungs pa ltar phyag rgya la sogs pa dgod pa las /
T02TD1358E:96b-27: phyag rgya drug rang gi lus la dgod pa /
T02TD1358E:96b-28: aom ham ha: b'a ma dakshi na karnna yor badzra kunda li hum h'um phat phat /
T02TD1358E:96b-29: aom aam aa: ka d+yam kanthe badzra me kha l'a badzra kinthi ka hum h'um phat phat /
T02TD1358E:96b-30: aom aa a'a b'a ma dikshi na ka ra yor badzra ru tsa koo hum h'um phat phat /
T02TD1358E:96b-31: aom ha h'a b'a ma da kisha na p'a da yor badzra n'u p'u re hum h'um phat phat /
T02TD1358E:96b-32: aom ham bam panytsa a'a k'a ra ma h'a sh'u n+ya sva bh'a wa ma h'a badzra shi ro ma ni shi ra si sarba aam ge bhasma hum h'um phat phat /
T02TD1358E:96b-33: aom aam aardha na r'i shva ra badzra aardha tsandra badzra patta aurdhe hum h'um phat phat /
T02TD1358E:96b-34: aom aa a'a: aom sarba sva ree ae ka tri sva ra sva bh'a ba badzra ydzonya pa b'i ta skendha hum h'um phat phat /
T02TD1358E:96b-35: ces pa ni phyag rgya drug gi cho ga'o //
T02TD1358E:97a-0: de nas 'chad par 'gyur ba'i glang po'i pags pa'i phyag rgya bcas pa'i phyag rgya bzhi'i @97a * //
T02TD1358E:97a-1: sngags rnams brjod par bya ste /
T02TD1358E:97a-2: aom ksha: dur d'a na t'a /
T02TD1358E:97a-3: bhi ma na ksha yam ka ra by'a ghra tsarma ka too hum h'um phat phat /
T02TD1358E:97a-4: aom ham ksha: trim shang sva ra sapta ti hra: sva di rgha byanydza na sv'a bh'a ba dyee t+ya ku la sha ta si ro bhir munda m'a la skandha aa ba lam bi ni skandhe hum h'um phat phat /
T02TD1358E:97a-5: aom ha hi hri hu hil panytsa skandha bi shuddha sva bh'a ba shi ra si ka p'a la m'a le hum h'um phat phat /
T02TD1358E:97a-6: ces pa ni phyag rgya bzhi'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1358E:97a-7: de ltar phyag rgya bcu rnams pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i dbye ba dang /
T02TD1358E:97a-8: gnas bcu drug gi dbye bas stong pa nyid bcu drug ces pa ni phyag rgya dgod pa'i cho ga'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1358E:97a-9: de nas g-yon dang g-yas kyi phyag mtshan gyi sa bon rnams brjod par bya ste /
T02TD1358E:97a-10: aom kshar: kro dha badzra h'um phat /
T02TD1358E:97a-11: aom kshar: badzra khadga h'um phat /
T02TD1358E:97a-12: aom kshar: badzra tri sh'u la h'um phat /
T02TD1358E:97a-13: aom kshur: badzra karta ri h'um phat /
T02TD1358E:97a-14: aom kshar: badzra b'a na h'um phat /
T02TD1358E:97a-15: aom kshar: badzra aam ku sha h'um phat /
T02TD1358E:97a-16: aom kshar: badzra da ma ru ka h'um phat /
T02TD1358E:97a-17: aom kshar: badzra mudga ra h'um phat /
T02TD1358E:97a-18: aom kshar: badzra tsakra h'um phat /
T02TD1358E:97a-19: aom kshra: badzra kunta h'um phat /
T02TD1358E:97a-20: aom kshra: badzra danda h'um phat /
T02TD1358E:97a-21: aom kshra: badzra parsh'u h'um phat /
T02TD1358E:97a-22: ces pa rnams ni g-yas kyi phyag mtshan rnams so //
T02TD1358E:97a-23: de nas g-yon gyi phyag mtshan rnams ni /
T02TD1358E:97a-24: dang por hv'am yig brjod par bya /
T02TD1358E:97a-25: aom h'um badzra ghante ho phrem phat /
T02TD1358E:97a-26: aom hv'am badzra khe ta ka ho phram phat /
T02TD1358E:97a-27: aom hv'am badzra kha tv'am ga ho phrem phat /
T02TD1358E:97a-28: aom hv'am badzra ka b'a la ho phrem phat /
T02TD1358E:97a-29: aom hv'am badzra tsa p'a ho phrem phat /
T02TD1358E:97a-30: aom hv'am badzra pa sha ho phrem phat /
T02TD1358E:97a-31: aom hv'am badzra ratna ho phrem phat /
T02TD1358E:97a-32: aom hv'am badzra padma ho phrem phat /
T02TD1358E:97a-33: aom hv'am badzra sham kha ho phrem phat /
T02TD1358E:97a-34: aom hv'am badzra a'a darsha ho phrem phat /
T02TD1358E:97a-35: aom hv'am badzra shrim kha le hv'am phrem phat /
T02TD1358E:97a-36: aom hv'am badzra tsa tur be ta sva bh'a ba braham shi ra ho phram phat /
T02TD1358E:97a-37: ces pa rnams phyag g-yon pa rnams su mtshan ma dgod pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1358E:97a-38: de nas glang po'i pags pa'i sngags rnams brjod pa ni /
T02TD1358E:97a-39: aom ksha ksh'a kshi ksh'i ksh'i ksh'ir kshu ksh'u kshil kshil ksham ksham /
T02TD1358E:97a-40: ha h'a hi h'i hir h'ir hu h'u hil h'il ham h'a:/
T02TD1358E:97a-41: sarba baghi bi da ri ta ga dza tsarma patta aardha rakta shra ba ta h'um phrem /
T02TD1358E:97a-42: phyag g-yas dang g-yon gyi sdigs mdzub dang bcas nas bzung ba ni /
T02TD1358E:97a-43: g-yas kyi lag pa dang mgo bo'i phyogs kyi lag pa dang /
T02TD1358E:97a-44: g-yon gyi rkang pa nas bzung bar bsam pa ni pags pa bzung ba'i rim pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1358E:97a-45: de nas klu'i rgyal po bcu dgod pa'i sngags ni /
T02TD1358E:97a-46: aom h'um badzra dza ya n'a gendra badzra dza t'a mu ku ta bandhe tishtha tishtha hum h'um phat phat /
T02TD1358E:97b-0: aom kshum badzra @97b bi dza ya n'a gendra badzra patta bandhe tishtha tishtha hum h'um phat phat /
T02TD1358E:97b-1: aom hyam hy'a badzra karko ta badzra padmoo b'a ma dkshi na kunda la yo: tishtha tishtha hum h'um phat phat /
T02TD1358E:97b-2: aom hram hr'am badzra ba su ki she kha p'a loo b'a ma daksha ni ru tsa ka yo: tishtha tishtha hum h'um phat phat /
T02TD1358E:97b-3: aom hvam hv'a badzra aa nanta ku li koo me kha l'a kanthi ka yo: tishtha tishtha hum h'um phat phat /
T02TD1358E:97b-4: aom hlam hl'a badzra taksha ko ma h'a padmoo b'a ma dakshi na p'a da n'u p'u ra yo: tishtha tishtha hum h'um phat phat /
T02TD1358E:97b-5: de ltar sngags dang phyag rgya dgod par byas la /
T02TD1358E:97b-6: mkha' 'gro ma rnams dang bcas pa'i rkang pa bcu drug pas sdang ba rnams bskrad pa dang /
T02TD1358E:97b-7: bdud la sogs pa bskrad pa'i sngags rnams dus kyi 'khor lo'i sngags pas yang nas yang du bzlas pa 'di lta ste /
T02TD1358E:97b-8: aom na mo badzra sa tva ya /
T02TD1358E:97b-9: na mo buddha bo dhi sa tv'a bhya: na mo badzra kro dha r'a dzi ndra ra dze bhya: na mo bi shva m'a tree na mo budddha bo dhi sa tva de bi bhya: na mo badzra d'a ki n'i bhya:/
T02TD1358E:97b-10: aom na mo bha gab te k'a la tsa kr'a ya /
T02TD1358E:97b-11: badzra bhee ra ba bh'i ka ra ya ma he nedre n'i la barnna sha r'i r'a ya /
T02TD1358E:97b-12: m'a ra kle sha hri da y'a kranta s'i ta rakta tsar n'a ya /
T02TD1358E:97b-13: krishna rakta si ta kanth'a ya n'i la si ta p'a ti rakta damsht'a ka ra lo gra ph'i sha na mu kh'a ya /
T02TD1358E:97b-14: krishna rakta si ta sa bye ta ra skandh'a ya /
T02TD1358E:97b-15: dva da sha bhu dz'a ya /
T02TD1358E:97b-16: sha da bim sha ti ka r'a ya /
T02TD1358E:97b-17: badzra khadga tri sh'u la karta ri b'a na ba aam ku sha da ma ru ka mungga ra tsa kra kunta danda par shu badzra ghanta khe ta kha tv'am ga ka p'a la ts'a pa p'a sha ratna ka ma la sha kha a'a darsha shr'im kha l'a brahma shi ro ga dza tsarma dhri ka ka r'a ya /
T02TD1358E:97b-18: by'a ghra tsarma nam ba sa n'a ya /
T02TD1358E:97b-19: skndeha munda m'a l'a ba lam bi na /
T02TD1358E:97b-20: shi ra si badzra patta mu ku te badzra ka p'a la m'a la aardha tsandra dha 'ra ya /
T02TD1358E:97b-21: kunda la ru tsa ka kanthi ka me kha l'a n'u p'ur bhasma ydzanyo pa b'it shi ro ma ni ma h'a mu dra n'a gendra bi bh'u sha n'a ya /
T02TD1358E:97b-22: badzra d'a kam n'e sam to sha ti hri da y'a ya /
T02TD1358E:97b-23: aindra aagni ya ma nee ri t+ya ba ru na b'a yu ku be ra a'i sh'a na brahma bishnu bi n'a ya ka ka rti ke ya na nid ma h'a k'a la gra ha naksha kshe tra p'a la /
T02TD1358E:97b-24: su rendra su rendra pha nindra bh'u tendra na rendra sam stu ta tsa ra n'a ya /
T02TD1358E:97b-25: zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rkang pa bcu drug pa'i sngags so //
T02TD1358E:97b-26: bdud rigs brgya'i phreng ba'i sngags kyi sa bon rnams ni gong du sngags brjod pa'i skabs su bshad pas 'dir ma bris so //
T02TD1358E:97b-27: rkang pa bdun cu rtsa gnyis pa ni gzhung ches dgos pas ma bris so //
T02TD1358E:98a-0: de nas rdo rje dgod par bya ba de nyid gsungs pa ltar dpal dang ldan pa'i rdo rje yan lag rnams la dgod pa ni dpral bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor @98a * //
T02TD1358E:98a-1: dkar po la aom yig dgod do //
T02TD1358E:98a-2: mgrin par nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dmar po la a'a: yig dgod do //
T02TD1358E:98a-3: snying gar sgra gcan gyi dkyil 'khor nag po la h'um yig dgod do //
T02TD1358E:98a-4: lte bar dus me'i dkyil 'khor ser po la ho yig dgod do //
T02TD1358E:98a-5: gtsug tor dang gsang bar rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par shes pa dang ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor ljang gu dang sngon po la ham ksha: dgod do //
T02TD1358E:98a-6: de ltar dkyil 'khor drug bsgoms la dkyil 'khor de rnams nyid la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du sa bon de rnams yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje rnams te /
T02TD1358E:98a-7: rtse mo bcu bdun pa dang /
T02TD1358E:98a-8: rtse mo sum cu so gsum pa pa dang /
T02TD1358E:98a-10: rtse mo drug cu rtsa lnga pa dang /
T02TD1358E:98a-12: yang rtse mo sum cu so gsum pa zhes pa ste /
T02TD1358E:98a-13: rdo rje rnams kyang so so'i dkyil 'khor gyi kha dog dang 'dra bar ji ltar gsungs pa'i tshad ltar bsgom par bya ste /
T02TD1358E:98a-14: yang de nyid nas gsungs pa ltar rdo rje nor bu rnam par dag pa sor gcig pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1358E:98a-15: spyi gtsug gi 'khor lo rnam par dag pa sor gnyis pa'o //
T02TD1358E:98a-16: dpral ba'i 'khor lo rnam par dag pa sor bzhi pa'o //
T02TD1358E:98a-17: mgrin pa'i 'khor lo rnam par dag pa sor lnga pa'o //
T02TD1358E:98a-18: snying ga'i 'khor lo rnam par dag pa sor brgyad pa'o //
T02TD1358E:98a-19: lte ba'i 'khor lo rnam par dag pa sor dgu pa'o //
T02TD1358E:98a-20: gsang gnas kyi 'khor lo rnam par dag pa sor bcu gnyis pa'o //
T02TD1358E:98a-21: de nas g-yon gyi dpung mgo'i tshigs la da di dir du dil ngam /
T02TD1358E:98a-22: gha ghi ghir ghu ghil gham /
T02TD1358E:98a-23: ga gi gir gu gil gam / kha khi khir khu khil kham /
T02TD1358E:98a-24: ka ki kir ku kil kam /
T02TD1358E:98a-25: zhes pa nam mkha' la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1358E:98a-26: thung du drug gi dbye ba dang /
T02TD1358E:98a-27: ka'i sde tshan yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje rtse mo sum cu rtsa gcig pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1358E:98a-28: de nas dpung mgo g-yas pa'i tshigs la /
T02TD1358E:98a-29: kk'a: kkl'i kk'u kkr'i kk'i kk'am /
T02TD1358E:98a-30: khkh'a: khkhl'i khkh'u khkhr'i khkh'i khkh'am /
T02TD1358E:98a-31: gg'a: ggl'i gg'u ggr'i gg'i gg'am /
T02TD1358E:98a-32: ghgh'a: ghghl'i ghgh'u ghghr'i ghgh'i ghgh'am /
T02TD1358E:98a-33: ngng'a: ngngl'i ngng'u ngngr'i ngng'i ngng'am /
T02TD1358E:98a-34: zhes pa ni sa la sogs pa ste ring po drug gi dbye ba dang /
T02TD1358E:98a-35: kk'a:'i sde tshan yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje rtse mo sum cu so gcig pa bsam mo //
T02TD1358E:98a-36: de ltar las kyi 'khor lo bcu gnyis rnams la rdo rje bsgom par bya ste /
T02TD1358E:98b-0: de yang de nyid gsungs pa ltar gru mo g-yon pa la tsa'i sde tshan @98b thung ngu'i bdag nyid do //
T02TD1358E:98b-1: gru mo g-yas ba la ring po'i bdag nyid do //
T02TD1358E:98b-2: de ltar g-yon pa'i ma khrig ma'i tshigs la ta'i sde tshan thung du rnams so //
T02TD1358E:98b-3: g-yas pa'i mkhrig ma'i tshigs la ring po rnams so //
T02TD1358E:98b-4: g-yon gyi dpyi mgo'i tshigs la pa'i sde tshan thung du rnams so //
T02TD1358E:98b-5: g-yas kyi dpyi mgo'i tshigs la ring po rnams so //
T02TD1358E:98b-6: pus mo g-yon pa'i tshigs la ta'i sde tshan thung du rnams so //
T02TD1358E:98b-7: pus mo g-yas pa'i tshigs la ring por nams so //
T02TD1358E:98b-8: long bu g-yon pa'i tshigs la sa'i sde tshan thung du rnams kyi rang bzhin no //
T02TD1358E:98b-9: long bu g-yas pa'i tshigs la ring po'i bdag nyid do zhes pa ni tshigs rnams la rdo rje dgod pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1358E:98b-10: rdo rje de rnams kyang nam mkha' la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshad dang mnyam pa /
T02TD1358E:98b-11: de nyid kyis bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1358E:98b-12: de rnams rim pa de bzhin bya ba'i 'khor lo rnams la /
T02TD1358E:98b-13: lag pa g-yon pa'i mthe'u chung nas brtsams te /
T02TD1358E:98b-14: rtsa ba'i tshigs rnams la thung du drug gi dbye bas ka'i sde tshan nga la sogs pa drug drug las byung ba'i rtse mo bdun bdun dang ldan pa'i rdo rje lnga bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1358E:98b-15: de ltar g-yas kyi mthe bo'i tshigs steng ma nas brtsams te /
T02TD1358E:98b-16: tshigs lnga la ring po drug dang ldan pa'i kk'a la sogs pa drug drug yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje rnams so //
T02TD1358E:98b-17: g-yon gyi sor mo'i dbus kyi tshigs rnams la tsa'i sde tshan thung du'i bdag nyid las rdo rje rnams so //
T02TD1358E:98b-18: g-yon gyi sor mo'i dbus kyi tshigs rnams la ring po'i bdag nyid rnams las so //
T02TD1358E:98b-19: g-yon gyi sor mo'i steng gi tshigs la ta'i sde tshan thung du'i bdag nyid rnams so //
T02TD1358E:98b-20: g-yas kyi sor mo'i rtsa ba'i tshigs rnams la ring po'i bdag nyid las so //
T02TD1358E:98b-21: rkang pa g-yon gyi sor mo'i tshigs rnams la snga ma ltar pa'i sde tshan thung du rnams kyi bdag nyid las so //
T02TD1358E:98b-22: rkang pa g-yas pa'i tshigs rnams la snga ma ltar ring po rnams kyis bdag nyid las so //
T02TD1358E:98b-23: de nas g-yon pa'i tshigs rnams la snga ma ltar ta'i sde tshan thung du rnams kyis bdag nyid las so //
T02TD1358E:98b-24: g-yas pa la ring po'i bdag nyid las so //
T02TD1358E:98b-25: de ltar g-yon pa'i tshigs rnams la sa'i sde tshan thung du'i bdag nyid rnams las so //
T02TD1358E:98b-26: g-yas pa'i tshig rnams la ring po'i bdag nyid las rdo rje rnams te /
T02TD1358E:99a-0: rim pa bzhin sde tshan rnams yongs su dag pa las ljang gu @99a * //
T02TD1358E:99a-6: so so'i tshigs kyi tshad kyis so //
T02TD1358E:99a-7: de nas rna ba la sogs par rdo rje dgod pa ni /
T02TD1358E:99a-8: de nyid las gsungs pa ltar /
T02TD1358E:99a-9: rna ba dag tu aa a'a dag las rdo rje rtse gsum pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1358E:99a-10: sna bug dag tu ae aee dag las so //
T02TD1358E:99a-11: mig dag tu aar a'ar dag las so //
T02TD1358E:99a-12: lce dang lce chung dag la ao aoo dag las so //
T02TD1358E:99a-13: rdo rje dang gsang ba dag la aal a'al dag las so //
T02TD1358E:99a-14: yid dang khu ba 'dzag pa'i rtsa dag ka aam a:a dag las te /
T02TD1358E:99a-15: 'di rnams kyang rim pa ji lta ba bzhin kha dog gi dbye ba dang ldan par sor gcig gi tshad kyis so //
T02TD1358E:99a-16: yang de nyid du gsungs pa ltar rna ba la sogs par rdo rje sor gcig pa zhes pas so //
T02TD1358E:99a-17: de nas gtsug tor la sogs pa rnams la rdo rje dgod pa ni /
T02TD1358E:99a-18: de yang de nyid las gsungs pa ltar gtsug tor dang mgo bo dag la ha h'a dag las rdo rje rtse lnga ba'o //
T02TD1358E:99a-19: lce dang rkan dag la ya y'a dag las rdo rje rtse lnga pa'o //
T02TD1358E:99a-20: lag mthil dag la ra r'a dag las so //
T02TD1358E:99a-21: rkang mthil dag la wa w'a dag las so //
T02TD1358E:99a-22: 'phongs kyi g-yas g-yon dag la l'a dag las so //
T02TD1358E:99a-23: de ltar rdo rje'i lus su bdag nyid bsgom par bya ba ni /
T02TD1358E:99a-24: de rnams kyi gtsug tor la sogs pa rnams par dag par gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02TD1358E:99a-25: de nas bdud kyi tshogs bsreg pa ni /
T02TD1358E:99a-26: de yang de nyid nas gsungs pa ltar de rnams las 'od zer 'phros pas rdo rje 'bar bas phyogs bcu na gnas pa'i bdud kyi chogs sems can rnams la rnam par 'tshe ba rnams bsregs nas /
T02TD1358E:99a-27: steng du ljang gu 'bar ba dang /
T02TD1358E:99a-29: shar dang shar lhor nag po 'bar ba dang /
T02TD1358E:99a-30: lho dang bden bral du dmar po 'bar ba dang /
T02TD1358E:99a-31: byang dang dbang ldan du dkar po 'bar ba dang /
T02TD1358E:99a-32: nub dang rlung du ser po 'bar ba dang zhes so //
T02TD1358E:99a-33: bdud kyi tshogs bsreg pa'i sngags brjod par bya ste /
T02TD1358E:99a-34: aom a'a: h'um ho: ham ksha: hra: hra: hra: hra: ra: ra: ra: ra: badzra aa na la sarba a'a ba ra na dharm'a pra la ya sva bh'a ba sarba m'a ra ya k'a yi ka bighna bi n'a da sha di ga t'a n'am k'a ya b'a ka tsitt'a ni /
T02TD1358E:99a-37: bha sim ku ru ku ru h'um hum phat phat /
T02TD1358E:99a-38: ces pa ni bdud rnams rnam par bsreg pa'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1358E:99a-39: de nas lus dang ngag dang yid kyi cho ga rnam par dag pa gzhal yas khang dang /
T02TD1358E:99b-0: ra @99b ba lnga rnams kyi nang dang /
T02TD1358E:99b-1: phyi rol bsrung ba'i don du /
T02TD1358E:99b-2: khro bo la sogs pa rnams rim pa ji lta ba bzhin spor bar bya'o //
T02TD1358E:99b-3: de nas yang de nyid nas gsungs pa ltar dang por rdo rje shugs su bdag nyid bsgoms la /
T02TD1358E:99b-4: de nyid kyi thugs kar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la ha yar wa la rnams brtsegs pa'i gzugs su bsam mo //
T02TD1358E:99b-5: de'i steng du ha las byung ba'i 'chad par 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya dang mtshan ma dang zhal rnams dang ldan pa'i sku mdog ljang gu sna bug g-yon pa nas spros te /
T02TD1358E:99b-6: gtso bo'i dbu'i steng du gzhal yas khang gi nang du zla ba'am nyi ma'i steng du gtsug tor can g-yas brkyang du bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD1358E:99b-7: de ltar ha yig ring po las byung ba'i gnod mdzes rgyal po kha dog sngon po sna bug g-yas nas bton nas rdo rje'i sa gzhi'i steng du nyi ma 'am zla ba la dgod do //
T02TD1358E:99b-8: de ltar ya yig las byung ba'i bgegs mthar byed kha dog nag po /
T02TD1358E:99b-9: sna bug g-yog pa nas byung nas shar phyogs su zla ba 'am nyi ma la dgod par bya'o //
T02TD1358E:99b-10: de ltar y'a yig yongs su rdzogs pa'i dbyug sngon can kha dog nag po sna bug g-yas nas bton te /
T02TD1358E:99b-11: me mtshams su nyi ma'am zla ba la dgod do //
T02TD1358E:99b-12: ri yig las byung ba'i shes rab mthar byed sku mdog dmar po /
T02TD1358E:99b-13: mig g-yo nas bton nas lho phyogs su zla ba 'am nyi ma la dgod do //
T02TD1358E:99b-14: de ltar r'i yig las yongs su rdzogs pa'i 'dod pa'i rgyal po dmar po /
T02TD1358E:99b-15: mi g-yas nas bton te bden bral du nyi ma'am zla ba la dgod par bya'o //
T02TD1358E:99b-16: de ltar w'u yig las yongs su rdzogs pa'i padma mthar byed dkar po lce las bton te /
T02TD1358E:99b-17: byang du zla ba'am nyi ma la dgod do //
T02TD1358E:99b-18: w'u yig las yongs su rdzogs pa'i mi g-yo ba dkar po dri chu'i lam nas bton te /
T02TD1358E:99b-19: dbang ldan gyi mtshams su zla ba 'am nyi ma la dgod do //
T02TD1358E:99b-20: l'i yig las yongs su rdzogs pa'i gshin rje mthar byed ser po chu min gyi lam nas bton te /
T02TD1358E:99b-21: nub phyogs su zla ba'am nyi ma la dgod do //
T02TD1358E:99b-22: de ltar l'i yig las yongs su rdzogs pa'i stobs po che ser po rdo rje gtsug tor nas bton te /
T02TD1358E:99b-23: rlung gi mtshams su zla ba 'am nyi ma la dgod par bya'o //
T02TD1358E:99b-24: yang na sdus pa'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brang nas thams cad nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa ste /
T02TD1358E:100a-0: de nas gzhal yas khang gi phyi rol du zad par nam mkha' la sogs pa @100a * //
T02TD1358E:100a-2: de yang de nyid las gsungs pa ltar thugs kar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la nga nya na man rnams brtsegs pa'i gzugs su bsgoms la /
T02TD1358E:100a-3: nga d'a las yongs su rdzogs pa'i zad par nam mkha'i sngon du bshad pa'i sgo rnams nas bton te /
T02TD1358E:100a-4: gzhal yas khang gi steng dang gnod mdzes rgyal po'i 'og dag tu stong pa'i dkyil 'khor la bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1358E:100a-5: de ltar nir n'ir dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i zad par rlung shar dang me mtshams su rlung gi dkyil 'khor la bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1358E:100a-6: de ltar nir n'ir dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i zad par me lho dang bden bral du me'i dkyil 'khor la bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1358E:100a-7: de ltar mu m'u dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i zad par chu byang dang dbang ldan gyi mtshams su chu'i dkyil 'khor la bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1358E:100a-8: de ltar nil n'il dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i zad par rlung shar dang me mtshams su sa'i dkyil 'khor la bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1358E:100a-9: de ltar gha dzha dha bha dha rnams su brtsegs pa'i yi ge bsgoms la /
T02TD1358E:100a-10: de rnams las phyogs skyong bcu spro ba ni /
T02TD1358E:100a-11: gha gh'a dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug / ljang gu dang sngon po /
T02TD1358E:100a-12: ngang pa dang bya khyung la gnas pa /
T02TD1358E:100a-16: de nas dzhri dzh'i dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i bden bral dang rlung lha dag / kha dog nag po /
T02TD1358E:100a-17: yi dags dang ri dags la gnas pa /
T02TD1358E:100a-19: de ltar lho dang bden bral du /
T02TD1358E:100a-20: dhri dhr'i las yongs su rdzogs pa'i gshin rje dang me lha /
T02TD1358E:100a-21: kha dog dmar po ma he dang lug la gnas pa'o //
T02TD1358E:100a-22: de ltar byang dang dbang ldan du bhu bh'u dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgya mtsho dang bde byed /
T02TD1358E:100a-23: kha dog dkar po chu srin dang khyu mchog la gnas pa'o //
T02TD1358E:100a-24: de ltar nub phyogs dang rlung du dhli dh'il dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i dbang po dang gnod sbyin /
T02TD1358E:100a-26: glang po che dang ba man la gnas pa'o //
T02TD1358E:100a-27: de ltar phyogs skyong rnams ra ba'i nang du bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1358E:100a-28: de nas rab bsrung ba'i don du gza' rnams bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1358E:100a-29: sngon du gsungs pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la /
T02TD1358E:100a-30: ga dza da ba da rnams brtsegs pa'i tshul du gnas pa las /
T02TD1358E:100a-31: ga g'a dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i sgra gcan dang dus me /
T02TD1358E:100b-0: stong pa'i dkyil 'khor la @100b gnas pa /
T02TD1358E:100b-1: rab gsum la phyogs pa steng dang 'og tu nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor la'o //
T02TD1358E:100b-2: de ltar dzi dz'i dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i zla ba dang nyi ma rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa /
T02TD1358E:100b-3: shar dang me mtshams su dgod do //
T02TD1358E:100b-4: dri dr'i dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i gza' lag dang bkra shis /
T02TD1358E:100b-6: lho dang bden bral du dgod do //
T02TD1358E:100b-7: de ltar bu b'u dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i pa wa sangs dang phur bu chu'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa /
T02TD1358E:100b-8: byang dang dbang ldan dag tu'o //
T02TD1358E:100b-9: de ltar dli dl'i dag las yongs su dag pa'i mjug rings dang spen pa /
T02TD1358E:100b-10: sa'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa nub dang rlung dag tu ste /
T02TD1358E:100b-11: 'di rnams ni ra ba'i phyi rol du bsrung ba'i don du gza'i tshogs rnams bsgom pa'o //
T02TD1358E:100b-12: de nas ra ba lnga bsrung bar bya ba'i don du klu'i rgyal po rnams spro bar bya ste /
T02TD1358E:100b-13: sngon du gsungs pa ltar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la kha tsha tha pha tha rnams brtsegs pa'i tshul du bsams nas /
T02TD1358E:100b-14: kha kh'a dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyal ba dang rnam par rgyal ba /
T02TD1358E:100b-15: ra ba lnga la phyogs pa steng 'og nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o //
T02TD1358E:100b-16: de ltar tshi tsh'i dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i karko ta dang padma dag / shar dang me mtshams su rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o //
T02TD1358E:100b-17: de ltar thri thr'i dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i chu bdag dang dung skyong /
T02TD1358E:100b-18: lho dang bden bral du me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o //
T02TD1358E:100b-19: de ltar phu ph'u dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i dga' bo dang rigs ldan /
T02TD1358E:100b-20: byang dang dbang ldan du chu'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o //
T02TD1358E:100b-21: de ltar thli thl'i dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i padma chen po dang 'jog po nub dang rlung dag tu sa'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o //
T02TD1358E:100b-22: de nas ra ba lnga'i phyi rol du bsrung ba'i don du 'byung po lha ma yin rnams bsgom par bya ste /
T02TD1358E:100b-23: sngon du gsungs pa ltar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la ka tsa ta pa ta rnams brtsegs pa'i tshul du bsam pa ste /
T02TD1358E:100b-24: de rnams kyang ra ba la phyogs pa steng dang 'og tu ka k'a dag las yongs su dag pa'i ro langs dang /
T02TD1358E:100b-25: ka sha m'andu nam mkha' dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o //
T02TD1358E:100b-26: de ltar tsi ts'i dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i ki na ra ga dang /
T02TD1358E:100b-27: kim pu ru sha khyi dang bya rog gi gdong can /
T02TD1358E:100b-28: shar dang mer rlung gi dkyil 'khor la dgod do //
T02TD1358E:101a-1: ngag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i dri za dang 'byung po /
T02TD1358E:101a-2: phag pa dang bya rgod kyi gdong pa can /
T02TD1358E:101a-3: lho dang bden bral du me'i dkyil 'khor dag la dgod do //
T02TD1358E:101a-4: de ltar pu p'u dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i srin po dang yi dags /
T02TD1358E:101a-5: stag dang 'ug pa'i gdong can byang dang dbang ldan du chu'i dkyil 'khor la dgod do //
T02TD1358E:101a-6: de ltar tli tl'i dag las yongs su rdzogs pa'i brjed byed ce sbyang gi gdong pa can dang /
T02TD1358E:101a-8: nub dang rlung du sa'i dkyil 'khor dag la dgod do //
T02TD1358E:101a-9: de rnams thams cad shes rab dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1358E:101a-10: yang de nyid du gsungs pa ltar /
T02TD1358E:101a-11: ye shes dang nam mkha' dang /
T02TD1358E:101a-15: sa rnams khams drug las byung ba'i khro bo'i rgyal po rnams dang /
T02TD1358E:101a-20: klu rnams dang 'byung po rnams sde tshan drug gi bdag nyid srung zhing skyong ba /
T02TD1358E:101a-21: phyi dang nang rnams su kha sbyor du gnas pa rnal 'byor pas dgod do //
T02TD1358E:101a-22: de nas bgegs dang log 'dren la sogs pa rnams la gdab par bya ba ni /
T02TD1358E:101a-23: de yang de nyid du gsungs pa ltar de las gzhan pa bgegs dang log 'dren la sogs pa rnams rdo rje lcags kyus khug cig / rdo rje zhags pas chings shig / khro bo'i rgyal po rdo rje phur bu rtse mo mdung gi rnam pa rnams gnas bcur sdang ba btab par bsam mo //
T02TD1358E:101a-24: sngags rnams kha dog lnga dang ldan pa ste /
T02TD1358E:101a-25: aom a'a: h'um ho: ham ksha: h'um h'um phat phat phat /
T02TD1358E:101a-26: badzra k'i la ya k'a ya b'a ka tsitta dzny'ana aa dhi pa de sha ta mu kha sha ta sarba tsa ra na sarba bighna bi n'a ya k'a di du sht'a nam k'a ya b'a ka tsitta dzny'a n'a ni k'ila ya h'um h'um phat phat /
T02TD1358E:101a-27: ces pa ni gdab pa'i sngags so //
T02TD1358E:101a-28: aom lli badzra mu dga ra /
T02TD1358E:101a-29: m'a r'a d'i n'am shi ra si kanthi hri da ye /
T02TD1358E:101a-30: n'a bhoo gu hya aa na te badzra k'i la ya k'a na a'a ko ta y'a ko ta ya /
T02TD1358E:101a-31: ksham ksh'am kshim ksh'im kshrim kshr'im kshum ksh'um kshlim kshl'm ksham ksh'am h'um h'um h'um phat phat phat /
T02TD1358E:101a-32: ces pa ni gdung ba'i sngags so //
T02TD1358E:101a-33: de nas nga rgyal byas nas phur bu rnams bsrung ba'i don du /
T02TD1358E:101a-34: khro bo bcu la bka' bsgo ba ni /
T02TD1358E:101a-35: de'i don du dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi rgyal bor gsungs pa /
T02TD1358E:101a-36: srid pa gsum gyi gnas su dbyug sngon can gyis bdud rnams ma lus rdung bar byed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1358E:101a-37: dus mtha'i nyi ma dang mtshungs khro bo mi g-yo ba yis 'ching ste phur 'debs shin tu brtson 'grus so //
T02TD1358E:101b-0: @101b dakkis de yi brtson 'grus 'jig rten sa ster gyur par gnod mdzes rgyal pos nges par byed pa'o //
T02TD1358E:101b-1: gtsug tor can gyis de yi rdzu 'phrul 'jig ste nges par khro bo'i lha mo rnams kyis snga ma bzhin du'o //
T02TD1358E:101b-3: aom h'um kro dhe ndro& ham kro dh'a n'am a'a dzny'a d'a ya kasv'ah'a /
T02TD1358E:101b-4: de nas khro bo rnams la so so'i sngags kyi rkang pas bka' bsgo ba /
T02TD1358E:101b-5: aom ham badzra kro dha r'a dza ma h'a au shn'i sha a'u rdha di shi rksham ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1358E:101b-6: aom yam badzra kro dha r'a dza aa dhi pa la sarba bi gha n'a nta ka p'u rba di shi raksh'am ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1358E:101b-7: aom ram badzra kro dha r'a dza dzam bha ka du sht'im pradzny'a nta ka dkshi ne di shi raksham ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1358E:101b-8: aom wa badzra kro dha r'a dza man ga bi ra ga padm'anta ka autta ra di shi ra ksh'am ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1358E:101b-9: aom lam badra kro dha r'a dza stam bha ka ya m'anta ka pa shtsi mdi di shi raksh'am ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1358E:101b-12: aom l'a: badzra kro dha r'a dza ma h'a ba la b'a ya by'am de shi raksh'am ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1358E:101b-13: aom w'a: badzra kro dha r'a dza aa tsa la a'i sha na di shi raksh'am ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1358E:101b-14: aom r'a: badzra kro dha r'a dza ta kki nee ri ty'am di shi ra ksh'am ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1358E:101b-15: aom h'a: badzra kro dha r'a dza n'i la da nda aa gne yam de shi raksh'am ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1358E:101b-16: aom h'a: badzra kro dha r'a dza sum bha aa dho di shi raksh'am ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02TD1358E:101b-17: zhes pa'i sngags kyi rkang pa 'di rnams ni /
T02TD1358E:101b-18: rgyud kyi sgrub thabs las gsungs pa'i cho gas sngags pas dgod par bya'o //
T02TD1358E:101b-19: de nas aom sarba ta th'a ga t'a raksh'am tsakra sv'a bh'a ba a'a tma ko& ham /
T02TD1358E:101b-20: zhes brjod la nga rgyal bya'o //
T02TD1358E:101b-21: 'di ni bsrung ba'i 'khor lo'i cho ga'o //
T02TD1358E:101b-22: de nas stong pa nyid du bsgoms nas bdag nyid gsung bar 'gyur ba'i bcom ldan 'das dus kyi 'khor lo /
T02TD1358E:101b-23: zhal dang phyag dang bzhugs tshul rnams su skad cig gis bsams la /
T02TD1358E:101b-24: de yang de nyid las gsungs pa ltar bdag nyid skad cig gis lha'i skur bsgoms nas /
T02TD1358E:101b-25: rang gi snying gar pam yig yongs su gyur pa las padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa /
T02TD1358E:101b-26: de'i lte ba'i steng du aam yig yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i dbus su de kho na zhes pa ni /
T02TD1358E:101b-27: h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa de las kha dog lnga dang ldan pa'i 'od zer 'phro ba rnal 'byor bas bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1358E:101b-28: de'i 'od zer gyis thog ma med pa'i sngon du gsungs pa'i dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo spyan drangs te /
T02TD1358E:101b-29: nam mkha'i dbus na bzhugs pa la /
T02TD1358E:102a-2: sgrub thabs kyi tshig rab tu bsdus par bya ba'i phyir dang /
T02TD1358E:102a-3: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsgom pa rjes su bsgrub pa'i phyir phyag btsal ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams 'di lta ste /
T02TD1358E:102a-4: sangs rgyas rnams dang rgyal sras khro bo phyogs skyong klu rnams dang ni de rnams kyi //
T02TD1358E:102a-5: lha mo'i tshogs dang rgyas 'debs bdag dang mchod pa'i lha mo rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1358E:102a-6: gang zhig brjod par 'gyur pa'i zhal gyi grangs rnams g-yas skor gyis ni go bya ste //
T02TD1358E:102a-7: g-yas dang g-yon gyi rtsa ba'i phyag na chu skyes dang ni rang mtshan go bar bya //
T02TD1358E:102a-8: sna tshogs padma zla ba nyi ma sgra gcan dus me 'phrog byed zhal gcig kha dog dkar //
T02TD1358E:102a-9: rig byed phyag na rtse gsum da ma ru dang dpal gyi dung dang kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD1358E:102a-10: rtse mo can gyi mig ldan g-yon du gan rgyal bsgyel ba gnas te g-yas su dran pa nyid //
T02TD1358E:102a-11: kha dog dmar po mda' lnga lcags kyu gzhu dang zhags pa rnams dang bcas pa de dag la //
T02TD1358E:102a-12: goo r'i dga' byed ma yis bzung ba dkar dang dmar ba'i g-yas brkyang zhabs kyis snying gar mnan //
T02TD1358E:102a-13: sa bon h'um yig dang ni rdo rje dag las byung ba'i ral ba'i thor tshugs sngon po can //
T02TD1358E:102a-14: mi bskyod pa ste zhal gyi padma sprin dang pa la 'od ldan ri bong can rnams rgya mtsho mtshungs //
T02TD1358E:102a-15: dbus dang g-yas dang g-yon rnams sngon po dmar po dkar po rnams dang ldan pa'i mgrin gsum pa //
T02TD1358E:102a-16: g-yon gyi dpung pa'i rim bzhin dkar min dmar dang dkar ba rnams te g-yas pa'i dpung ba gsum //
T02TD1358E:102a-17: de bzhin yin te bcom ldan 'das kyis lag ngar zung gsum phyag gi mgo bo zhi pa gsum //
T02TD1358E:102a-18: sor mo rnams ni gser dang zla ba nyi ma sprin dang /
T02TD1358E:102a-19: ljang gu mthe ba sogs rim pa bzhin //
T02TD1358E:102a-20: de rnams rtse mo dbus dang rtsa ba rnams kyi tshigs ni sprin dang nyi ma thig le rnams /
T02TD1358E:102a-21: mi mgo skam po lnga rnams kha dog lnga dang ldan pas nyid kyi dbu la brgyan //
T02TD1358E:102a-22: mgrin la mgul rgyan nyid dang sked la ska rags rna rgyan gyis ni rna ba la //
T02TD1358E:102a-23: lag pa dag la yid 'ong lag gdub rkang pa dag la rkang gdub mdzes pas spras //
T02TD1358E:102a-24: dbul dar dbyangs sku la thugs kar mchod phyir thogs pa rnams kyis brgyan //
T02TD1358E:102a-25: so so'i zhal rnams spyan gsum dang ldan nor bu rdo rje zla ba dang //
T02TD1358E:102a-26: dbu nyid la ste mi mgo brgya yi phreng ba mgo 'dzin la gnas //
T02TD1358E:102b-0: stag gi sham thabs dang ldan rdo rje ral gri rtse @102b gsum gri gug / mda' dang lcags kyu cang te'u thod pa 'khor lo dung rnams dang ni //
T02TD1358E:102b-1: dbyug pa dgra sta g-yas min rnams te dril bu phub chung dag ste //
T02TD1358E:102b-2: kha tv'am ga dang dung dang thod pa mda' gnas zhags pa rin chen //
T02TD1358E:102b-3: chu skyes dang ni dung dang mchog gi me long lcags sgrog rnams dang //
T02TD1358E:102b-4: rigs byed gdod ldan mgo bo rnams kyi phyag nyid rnams la mtshan pa //
T02TD1358E:102b-5: phrem yig gri gug las byung bud med gzugs can sku mdog ser mo //
T02TD1358E:102b-6: dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo las gzhan bzhugs pas rab tu 'khyud pa //
T02TD1358E:102b-7: phyag rgya dang ldan klu yi phyag gis padma sna tshogs yum gyi //
T02TD1358E:102b-8: dbul dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' cod pan la gnas //
T02TD1358E:102b-9: gri gug lcags kyu cang te'u phreng ba rnams ni rim pa bzhin du //
T02TD1358E:102b-10: thod pa zhags pa chu skyes rin chen rnams ni phyag gis 'dzin ma //
T02TD1358E:102b-11: gser dang zla ba dang ni sprin dang nyi ma rnams dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD1358E:102b-12: gang zhig zhal bzhi rnams ni me yi spyan dang rab tu ldan ma //
T02TD1358E:102b-13: aam yig rdo rje dag las byung ba'i rdo rje sems dpa' gang zhig ye shes rnam dag pa //
T02TD1358E:102b-14: sngo dang nyi ma zla ba'i zhal gsum spyan dgu rdo rje 'dug stangs gnas pa'i mnga' bdag nyid //
T02TD1358E:102b-15: rdo rje sngon po gri gug dgra sta dril bu thod pa tshangs mgo rnams ni rim pa bzhin //
T02TD1358E:102b-16: phyag drug la yin ral pa dang ldan sku la rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma yis 'khyud //
T02TD1358E:102b-17: shes rab pha rol phyin mas 'khyud pa'i rnam par shes pa dag pa'i bdag nyid mi bskyod ljang //
T02TD1358E:102b-18: aa dang rdo rje dag las byung ba'i mi bskyod rdo rje sems dpa'i rnam pa dang ni mtshungs //
T02TD1358E:102b-19: mi bskyod rnam pa dang mtshungs a'a dang gri gug las byung rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma //
T02TD1358E:102b-20: aa: dang gri gug las byung shes rab pha rol phyin ma rdo rje sems dpa'i rnam pa bzhin //
T02TD1358E:102b-21: dag pa'i lus la sna tshogs pa'i //
T02TD1358E:102b-23: dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo gang //
T02TD1358E:102b-25: rin chen gtsug ma dang mtshungs pa'i //
T02TD1358E:102b-26: nag mo 'bar ba la sogs pa //
T02TD1358E:102b-27: brgyad rnams zhal bzhi phyag brgyad ma //
T02TD1358E:102b-28: mnga' bdag pad 'dab rnams la gnas //
T02TD1358E:102b-29: aa yig rnams kyi gsang ba'i thod pa las byung dpal nyid nag mo 'bar ma mdun du gnas //
T02TD1358E:102b-30: na bza' nag mo sprin dang nyi ma gser dang ri bong can gyi zhal rnams rim pa bzhin //
T02TD1358E:103a-1: spos dang ni tsandan gur gum gla tsi ga pur dang bcas padma'i snod rnams dang //
T02TD1358E:103a-2: dril bu padma lha shing me tog phreng ba gang ba de nyid rnams la bstod //
T02TD1358E:103a-3: g-yas su aa: yig dang ni mar me dag las byung ba'i dmar mo //
T02TD1358E:103a-4: 'bar ma nyi ma ser dang dkar dang nag po'i zhal dang ldan ma //
T02TD1358E:103a-5: phyag na mar me mu tig phreng ba cod pan lag gdub rnams dang //
T02TD1358E:103a-6: gos dang ska rags rna rgyan rkang gdub rnams dang ldan la phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1358E:103a-7: g-yon du aam yig dang ni lha bshos las byung ba'i //
T02TD1358E:103a-8: dkar mo 'bar ma dkar nag dmar ser zhal dang ldan //
T02TD1358E:103a-9: 'o ma chu dang sman dang chang dang ro rnams dang //
T02TD1358E:103a-10: bdud rtsi 'bras bu zan snod phyag ldan nyid la 'dud //
T02TD1358E:103a-11: chu bdag tu ni a'a yig dag las byung ba'i sor mo 'bar ma //
T02TD1358E:103a-12: gser dang zla ba bung ba dang ni drod byed rnams dang ldan ma //
T02TD1358E:103a-13: dur dang gling bu dang ni nor bu cang te'u pi wang dang ni //
T02TD1358E:103a-14: rnga dang mchog gi 'khor rnga zangs dung phyag na bsnams la phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1358E:103a-15: ha h'a ham ha: rnams las byung ba'i ser dang dkar dang dmar dang bung ba'i kha dog ldan //
T02TD1358E:103a-16: rlung dang dbang ldan srin po me yi 'dab ma rnams la lha mo rnams te mar me ma //
T02TD1358E:103a-17: me khyer ma dang smig rgyu ma ste dpal gyi du ba ma yi phyag rnams ma lus pas //
T02TD1358E:103a-18: rim bzhin rnga yab 'dzin ma rang rang mdog mtshungs lnga ma las byung rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1358E:103a-19: rtse mo can dang srin po dbang ldan rlung mtshams rnams la gnas pa //
T02TD1358E:103a-20: h'um yig las byung nor bu dang ni a'a: yig las byung gand'i //
T02TD1358E:103a-21: aom yig las byung chu spyod ho: yig las byung dpag bsam shing rnams //
T02TD1358E:103a-22: byung ba'i nyi ma zla ba gser mchog 'od ldan rnams la phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1358E:103a-23: sangs rgyas zhal gsum phyag drug pa //
T02TD1358E:103a-24: spyan dgu pad dkar nyi ma la //
T02TD1358E:103a-25: thams cad rdo rje'i 'dug stangs bzhugs //
T02TD1358E:103a-26: de rnams ral pa'i cod pan can //
T02TD1358E:103a-27: dbang po aa yig ral gri dag las byung ba'i don yod grub pa //
T02TD1358E:103a-28: rlung dang 'du byed rang bzhin rung ba nyi ma dkar ba'i zhal ldan /
T02TD1358E:103a-29: ral gri dang ni gri gug rtse gsum phub chung thod pa dang ni //
T02TD1358E:103a-30: kha tv'am ga rnams bsnams pa'i dkar min spyan gsum ldan la phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1358E:103a-31: g-yas su ram yig rin chen las byung dpal ldan rin chen 'byung ldan //
T02TD1358E:103a-32: dmar po me dang tshor ba'i rang bzhin nyi ma zla ba bung ba'i //
T02TD1358E:103b-0: zhal ldan bdag gi mi yi mnga' bdag @103b mda' dang lcags kyu cang te'u //
T02TD1358E:103b-1: gzhu dang rin chen zhags pa phyag na bsnams pa rnams la phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1358E:103b-2: g-yon du au yig padma las byung 'od dpag med ni dkar po //
T02TD1358E:103b-3: chu dang 'du shes rang bzhin bdud rtsi 'od 'phro sprin dang nyi zhal //
T02TD1358E:103b-4: dpal ldan gos dkar mo yis sbras pa tho ba mdung thung rtse gsum /
T02TD1358E:103b-5: chu skyes dkar po me long phreng ba rnams 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1358E:103b-6: rgyab tu li yig 'khor lo dag las byung ba'i rnam snang ser po //
T02TD1358E:103b-7: sa dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin gser dang zla ba nag po'i zhal ldan //
T02TD1358E:103b-8: sgrol mas sbras pa'i 'khor lo dang ni dbyug pa rdo rje bsnams dang //
T02TD1358E:103b-9: dpal gyi dung dang lcags sgrog dril bu phyag na 'dzin pa la bstod //
T02TD1358E:103b-10: sangs rgyas rnams mtshungs btsun mo rnams //
T02TD1358E:103b-11: padma dmar dang zla ba la //
T02TD1358E:103b-13: kun la rin chen cod pan bsam //
T02TD1358E:103b-14: l'i yig 'khor lo dag las byung ba'i spyan ma sa khams rang bzhin //
T02TD1358E:103b-15: rnam par snang mdzad mtshungs dang don grub dang bcas rlung mtshams gnas dang //
T02TD1358E:103b-16: a'u yig padma las byung bdag gi ma ste chu khams rang bzhin //
T02TD1358E:103b-17: 'od dpag med mtshungs rin 'byung dang bcas dbang ldan gnas la phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1358E:103b-18: r'i yig dang ni rin chen dag las byung ba'i gos dkar mo ste //
T02TD1358E:103b-19: me khams rang bzhin rin 'byung dang mtshungs bden bral la gnas pa dang //
T02TD1358E:103b-20: a'i yig ral gri las byung ba yi sgrol ma rlung khams rang bzhin //
T02TD1358E:103b-21: don grub dang mtshungs rnam snang dang bcas me mtshams gnas la phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1358E:103b-22: ham yig las byung rgyal ba'i bum pa mtshan nyid dang ldan dpal ldan thugs kyi 'khor lo yi //
T02TD1358E:103b-23: shar gyi sgo ru khro bo'i gdan gyi phyi ru padma nyid la dgod par bya ba ste //
T02TD1358E:103b-24: de ltar hi yig las byung gti mug rdo rje'i g-yas su dgod de de bzhin rin chen sogs //
T02TD1358E:103b-25: g-yas dgod hri hu hli las byung bum pa de rnam la ni phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1358E:103b-26: h'li h'um hr'i h'i las byung bum pa spyan sogs g-yas su rim bzhin dgod //
T02TD1358E:103b-27: ha yig las byung rnam rgyal bum pa sgo gzhan gnas la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1358E:103b-28: sangs rgyas ji bzhin rgyal sras rnams //
T02TD1358E:103b-29: 'on kyang rin chen cod pan ldan //
T02TD1358E:103b-30: lha mo de bzhin lha mo rnams //
T02TD1358E:103b-31: de ltar rin bzhin rab tu gnas //
T02TD1358E:103b-32: aa yig rdo rje dag las byung ba'i dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje thugs kar rdo rje nyid //
T02TD1358E:104a-1: bzung ba rna ba'i dbang po'i bdag nyid mnga' bdag mi bskyod pa dang mtshungs pa ste //
T02TD1358E:104a-2: ljang gu lho sgo'i g-yon gyi rtsig pa'i drung du de yi gdan dang mtshungs par bzhugs pa la //
T02TD1358E:104a-3: spyi bo sa la reg ste de yi zhabs la shin tu dga' bas rab tu phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1358E:104a-4: ai yig ral gri dag las byung ba'i nam mkha'i snying po don grub dang mtshungs sna nyid kyi //
T02TD1358E:104a-5: dbang po'i rang bzhin dpal gyi rdo rje ma bcas shar sgo'i g-yas na bzhugs pa la phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1358E:104a-6: aar yig rin chen las byung sa yi snying po rin chen 'byung ldan dang mtshungs sku mdog dmar po nyid //
T02TD1358E:104a-7: mig gi dbang po'i rang bzhin dpal ldan gzugs kyi rdo rje mar bcas lho sgo'i g-yas gnas dang //
T02TD1358E:104a-8: aom yig pad byung 'jig rten dbang phyug 'od dpag med mtshungs rdo rje rjes //
T02TD1358E:104a-9: bcas dang lce dbang rang bzhin byang sgo'i g-yas su gnas la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1358E:104a-10: aal yig 'khor lo las byung sgrib pa rnam sel mdzes pa'i gser dang mtshungs pa yi //
T02TD1358E:104a-11: lus kyi dbang po'i rang bzhin dpal ldan rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad dang mtshungs pa //
T02TD1358E:104a-12: gang gi pang na reg bya rdo rje ma dang bcas nub sgo'i g-yas phyogs na //
T02TD1358E:104a-13: rgyun du yang dag gnas pa de la rtag tu gus pas rab tu phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1358E:104a-14: aam yig rdo rje dag las byung ba'i kun du bzang //
T02TD1358E:104a-15: sku la chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje ma yis 'khyud //
T02TD1358E:104a-16: yid kyi rang bzhin dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpar mtshungs //
T02TD1358E:104a-17: shar sgo'i g-yon du gnas pa la phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1358E:104a-18: aa yig dang ni rdo rje dag las byung ba'i rdo rje ma ste sgar yi rang bzhin dang //
T02TD1358E:104a-19: dpal ldan phyag rdor dang mtshungs shes rab pha rol phyin ma dang mtshungs byang sgo'i g-yon du gnas //
T02TD1358E:104a-20: a'a la yig dang ni 'khor lo dag las byung ba'i dri yi rdo rje ma ste dri yi rang bzhin dang //
T02TD1358E:104a-21: dpal ldan spyan ma dang mtshungs nam mkha'i snying po dang bcas rlung mtshams bzhugs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1358E:104a-22: aoo yig chu skyes dag las byung ba'i gzugs kyi rdo rje ma ste gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang //
T02TD1358E:104a-23: dpal ldan bdag gi ma mtshungs sa yi snying po dang bcas dbang ldan la gnas phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1358E:104a-24: a'ar yig dang ni rin chen las byung ba yi ro yi rdo rje ma ste ro yi rang bzhin dang //
T02TD1358E:104a-25: dpal ldan gos dkar mo mtshungs 'jig rten dbang po dang bcas bden bral la gnas phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1358E:104b-0: aee yig dang ni ral @104b gri dag las byung ba'i reg bya rdo rje ma ste reg bya'i rang bzhin dang //
T02TD1358E:104b-1: sgrol ma dang mtshungs sgrib pa rnam sel dang bcas me mtshams gnas la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1358E:104b-2: a'a yig rdo rje las byung chos dbyings rdo rje ma ste rdo rje dbyings ma dang mtshungs ma //
T02TD1358E:104b-3: kun du bzang po dang ni bcas pa nub sgo'i g-yon la gnas pa la ni phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1358E:104b-4: khro rnams ral gcig dmar la ser //
T02TD1358E:104b-5: ngag lag rkang bshad rang bzhin te //
T02TD1358E:104b-6: sangs rgyas sras rnams dang mtshungs ba //
T02TD1358E:104b-7: g-yas brkyang zhabs dang sprul gyis brgyan //
T02TD1358E:104b-8: yam yig dang ni ral gri dag las byung ba'i bgegs kyi dgra nyid nam mkha'i snying po mtshungs //
T02TD1358E:104b-9: rengs byed ma ni m'a r'i tsi mtshungs spangs gnas shar sgo'i dbus su chu skyes dkar po dang //
T02TD1358E:104b-10: nyi ma la gnas pa dang ram yig dbyug pa las byung shes rab mthar byed sa snying dang //
T02TD1358E:104b-11: mtshungs dang nga rgyal ma mtshungs tsunda dang bcas lho phyogs la gnas dag la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1358E:104b-12: byang sgor padma zla ba la gnas wam yig chu skyes dag las byung ba'i padma'i dgra //
T02TD1358E:104b-13: 'jig rten dbang phyug dang mtshungs rmongs byed ma ni khro gnyer can ma dang ni mtshungs pa dang //
T02TD1358E:104b-14: lam yig tho ba las byung gshin rje'i dgra nyid sgrib pa sel mtshungs shin tu brtson 'grus ma //
T02TD1358E:104b-15: rdo rje lcags sgrog dang ni mtshungs pa pam gnas nub phyogs la gnas zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1358E:104b-16: rdo rje dung dang gzer bu dang //
T02TD1358E:104b-18: de ltar phyag mtshan rnams las byung //
T02TD1358E:104b-19: so so'i ming gis mchod byed pa //
T02TD1358E:104b-20: ka tsa ta pa ta sa sde tshan thung du thogs las byung ba ni //
T02TD1358E:104b-21: lha dang gshin rje la sogs g-yas kyi 'dod yon rnams dang steng dang 'og /'dir ni rim pa bzhin du glu ma dri ma spos ma gsol zas ma //
T02TD1358E:104b-22: lho mo sgeg mo gar ma ma lus phyag gnyis zla ba'i zhal dang ldan //
T02TD1358E:104b-23: pa ta ha dang snod mar me //
T02TD1358E:104b-24: mu tig phreng dang phreng chu skyes //
T02TD1358E:104b-25: rim bzhin phyag mtshan las byung ba //
T02TD1358E:104b-26: lha mo thams cad sa bon mdog / s'a t'a p'a t'a ts'a k'a'i sde tshan ring po brtsegs pa gyur las byung ba yi //
T02TD1358E:104b-27: chu sogs g-yon gyi 'dod pa yon rnams dang steng dang 'og rnams la //
T02TD1358E:104b-28: de ltar rim pa bzhin du sgra ma bzhad ma bdud rtsi ma rnams dang //
T02TD1358E:104b-29: mar me ma dang phreng ba ma dang 'dod pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1358E:104b-30: zhes pa ni thugs kyi 'khor lo la phyag btsal ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'i rim pa'o //
T02TD1358E:105a-0: @105a * // lha mo tsa rtsi k'a sogs sa ga'i rkang stabs dang //
T02TD1358E:105a-1: zhal gcig spyan gsum rig byed lag dang ldan pa yi //
T02TD1358E:105a-2: lte ba'i padma la gnas gshin rje'i rtsa rnams kyi //
T02TD1358E:105a-3: rnam par dag pa'i rin chen dang ldan chod pan can //
T02TD1358E:105a-4: shar du ha yig gri gug las byung tsa rtsi k'a //
T02TD1358E:105a-5: gri gug rtse gsum thod pa kha tv'am ga nyid bsnams //
T02TD1358E:105a-6: phyag na 'dzin pa'i dbang po dang bcas gang yin pa //
T02TD1358E:105a-7: ro dang padma dmar gnas la ni phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1358E:105a-8: tsa rtsi k'a sogs padma bsnams //
T02TD1358E:105a-9: rim pas chu tshod rtsa rang bzhin //
T02TD1358E:105a-10: mdun nas g-yas skor rim pa bzhin //
T02TD1358E:105a-11: padma rnams la rol pas bzhugs //
T02TD1358E:105a-12: 'jigs byed drag po mche ba gnyis gtsigs ma dang kha nas me 'bar ma dang rlung shugs rab gtum ma //
T02TD1358E:105a-13: gtum mig ma dang sna chen ma rnams klu yi pad 'dab rnams la rtsa rtsi k'a la phyogs nas gnas pa'o //
T02TD1358E:105a-14: brgyad rnams dpal gyi gtso mo dang mtshungs hri ya yir sbre hi yig rnams dang gri gug las byung bsgom //
T02TD1358E:105a-15: yu ylim yam rnams dang ni gri gug las byung dpal gyi rnal 'byor rnams la 'dir ni phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1358E:105a-16: ha: yig dbyug pa dag las byung ba'i phag mo dmar mo dang ni bde byed dkar po dang bcas nyi ma yi //
T02TD1358E:105a-17: padma ma he'i steng gnas phyag na dbyug pa ral gri lcags sgrog phub chung rnams dang ldan pa //
T02TD1358E:105a-18: gshin rje la ni bzhugs pa'i zhabs gnyis dag la nges par phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1358E:105a-19: keng rus dus mtshan ma dang khro gdong dus kyi lce dang gtsigs ma //
T02TD1358E:105a-20: nag mo 'jigs ma gzugs ngan klu yi 'dab ma la gnas lha rnams //
T02TD1358E:105a-21: dpal gyi lha mo dang mtshungs hri ra ri rri hr'i ru rli ram rnams dang //
T02TD1358E:105a-22: dbyug pa las byung dpal ldan rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1358E:105a-23: tam yig rtse gsum dag las byung ba'i drag mo nyid kyi phyag na rtse gsum cang te'u kha tv'am ga dang ltos 'gor dkar po //
T02TD1358E:105a-24: rin pa ji lta ba rnams gshin rje dang bcas byang chub du khyu mchog dang ni padma dmar po la gnas pa la phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1358E:105a-25: goo r'i dang ni gam g'a ma dang rtag ma shin tu mgyogs ma 'degs ma mtshan nyid ldan ma dang //
T02TD1358E:105a-26: ser skya ma dang nag mo rnams te de ltar brgyad rnams drag mo'i klu yi pad 'deb la gnas rnams //
T02TD1358E:105a-27: dpal gyi drag mo dang ni mtshungs ma tu wa wi wri hum nyid rnams dang wu wli wa rnams //
T02TD1358E:105b-0: rtse gsum dag las byung ba de rnams kun la rab tu dad pa'i sgo nas nges par phyag 'tshal @105b lo ;
T02TD1358E:105b-1: / h'a yig rdo rje las byung dbang mo gser gyi kha dog dang mtshungs //
T02TD1358E:105b-2: rdo rje mda' dang dril bu gzhu ni lag pa'i padmas 'dzin ma //
T02TD1358E:105b-3: lha min dang bcas chu bdag phyogs su glang po dkar po dang ni //
T02TD1358E:105b-4: padma dmar po'i steng na gnas pa la ni rab tu phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1358E:105b-5: rdo rje 'od ma rdo rje lus ma gser mchog ldan ma rigs 'dzin ma sna tshogs ri mo ma //
T02TD1358E:105b-6: chu shing ma dang zung rdu sel la ma shin tu sgrol ma rnams ni lag 'dzin pad 'dab la //
T02TD1358E:105b-7: gnas pa brgyad rnams dpal gyi gtso mo dang mtshungs hli la li lli lam rnams dang ni //
T02TD1358E:105b-8: rdo rje dag las rab tu byung ba'i rnal 'byor ma rnams kun la dir ni nges par phyag 'tshal lo ;
T02TD1358E:105b-9: / ksh'a yig dung dag las byung tshangs ma zhal bzhi nyi ma'i spyan ldan kha dog ser po dung dang dbyug pa spyi blugs thod pa rnams dang ldan pa //
T02TD1358E:105b-10: sprin gyi kha dog dang ni mtshungs pa'i 'phrog byed dang ni bcas pa rlung mtshams dang pa pad dkar steng nag gnas pa la ni phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1358E:105b-11: nyi ma'i bu mo padma'i mig ma chu skyes ldan ma blo ma dag gi dbang phyug ma rnams dang //
T02TD1358E:105b-12: glu ma dang ni glog ma dran ma rnams ni rig byed zhal gyi padma 'dab ma la ni gnas pa rnams //
T02TD1358E:105b-13: rim pa bzhin du kshl'i l'a l'i lr'i kshl'i l'u lli la: rnams dang dung dag las ni byung ba yi //
T02TD1358E:105b-14: tshangs ma dang ni rnal 'byor ma rnams kun la rab tu dang bas yang dag phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1358E:105b-15: kshu dang padma las byung bkra shis ma ni zla ba dang mtshungs pad phreng ka ma la dang rin chen nor bu phyag ldan ma //
T02TD1358E:105b-16: ra yi gdong can dang bcas dbang ldan phyogs na seng ge pad dkar steng na gnas pa'i zhabs kyi padma la ni nges par phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1358E:105b-17: dpal ldan dkar mo zla ba'i ri mo can ma ri bong 'dzin zhal dang pa'i mdog ma 'dzin byed ma //
T02TD1358E:105b-18: padma'i dbang phyung ma dang 'od zer can ma dri med zla 'dzi ma rnams dbang ldan mtshams nyid du //
T02TD1358E:105b-19: bkra shis ma yi pad 'dab rnams la rim bzhin kshu w'a w'i wr'i ksh'u w'u wl'i wa: rnams dang ni //
T02TD1358E:105b-20: padma dag las yang dag byung ba'i rnal 'byor ma rnams kun la thams cad phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1358E:105b-21: kshr'i yig shakti las byung gzhon nu ma nyid nyi ma dang mtshungs //
T02TD1358E:105b-22: shakti lcags kyur rin chen zhags pa rnams ni phyag gis 'dzin ma //
T02TD1358E:105b-23: bden bral mtshams nas rma bya padma dkar po'i steng na gnas pa'i //
T02TD1358E:105b-24: tshogs kyi bdag po dang ni bcas pa gang yin de la phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1358E:106a-0: padma dus su ma dang yan @106a * //
T02TD1358E:106a-1: lag med ma gzhon nu ma dang seng ge 'gros ma rin chen phreng ba ma //
T02TD1358E:106a-2: mig mdzes ma dang kun ma bzang mo rnams ni gtso mo chu skyes gtsug phud can gyis 'gros ma yi //
T02TD1358E:106a-3: padma'i 'dab ma la gnas rim pa bzhin du kshr'i r'a r'i rr'i kshr'i r'u rl'i ra: rnams dang ni //
T02TD1358E:106a-4: shakti dag las byung ba'i lha mo de rnams dang ni bcas ba rnams la rgyun du phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1358E:106a-5: ksh'i yig 'khor lo dag las byung ba'i dpal ldan khyab 'jug ma nyid //
T02TD1358E:106a-6: zhal bzhi dang bcas pa yis gnag pa'i sku mnga' 'khor lo dbyug pa //
T02TD1358E:106a-7: chu skyes dang ni dag pa'i dung rnams 'dzin pa'i phyag ldan me mtshams //
T02TD1358E:106a-8: padma dkar po dang ni bya khyung la gnas de la phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1358E:106a-9: dpal mo sgyu 'phrul ma dang grags ma bkra shis ma dang shin tu rgyal ma dpal rgyal rnams dang //
T02TD1358E:106a-10: rab tu rgyal ma dpal ldan 'khor lo can ma dag dang brgyad ni khyab 'jug ma yi pad 'dab la //
T02TD1358E:106a-11: gnas pa rnams ni rim pa bzhin du ksh'i y'a y'i yar'i ksh'i y'u yal'i ya: ma lus pa rnams dang ;
T02TD1358E:106a-12: /'khor lo dag las byung ba'i lha mo de rnams dang bcas rnams la dang bas rgyun du phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1358E:106a-13: lho sgo'i g-yon gyi 'dod yon rnams la ka kha ga gha nga rnams tsheg drag dang bcas pa'i //
T02TD1358E:106a-14: sa bon rnams dang so so'i phyag mtshan rnams las byung ba'i 'dod ma lnga rnams phyag gnyis ri bong zhal //
T02TD1358E:106a-15: shar sgo la sogs rnams kyi g-yas kyi 'dod yon rnams la sa bon rang bzhin tsa ta pa ta yi //
T02TD1358E:106a-16: sde tshan rnams las de ltar rab tu byung ba de rnams lnga lnga so so'i phyogs la gnas pa dang //
T02TD1358E:106a-17: shar sgo'i g-yon gyi 'dod yon la //
T02TD1358E:106a-18: sa sde las byung ha sde las //
T02TD1358E:106a-19: byung ba byang g-yon de las gzhan //
T02TD1358E:106a-20: kshi yig las byung rnams la 'dud //
T02TD1358E:106a-21: ces pa rnams gsung gi 'khor lo'i tshigs su bcad pa'o //
T02TD1358E:106a-22: tsa rtsi k'a sogs dang mtshungs 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyi rigs rnams //
T02TD1358E:106a-23: rigs byed brgyad dang bcu drug padma'i 'dab ma su ma brtsegs la gnas //
T02TD1358E:106a-24: aa sogs sa bon rnams dang rdo rje las byung rdo rje dang bcas //
T02TD1358E:106a-25: khyab 'jug la sogs rnams dang tshes kyi lha mo rnams dang bcas pa //
T02TD1358E:106a-26: nga di dri du dli ngam /
T02TD1358E:106a-27: gha ghi ghri ghu ghli gham /
T02TD1358E:106a-28: ga gi gri gu gli gam / kha khi khri khu khli kham /
T02TD1358E:106a-29: ka ki kri ku kli kam / rnams dang 'khor lo las byung ba //
T02TD1358E:106b-0: pang gnas rnams ni mnga' bdag dang mtshungs rol pas @106b gnas //
T02TD1358E:106b-1: dpal gyi dgun zla tha chungs tshes rnams dang ni nges par dpung mgo'i tshigs kyi rang bzhin can //
T02TD1358E:106b-2: 'di rnams dang bcas shar sgo'i g-yon du bya khyung padma dmar po'i steng gnas kam yig dang //
T02TD1358E:106b-3: 'khor lo las byung ba yi khyab 'jug ljang gu'i lus la dpal mo gnod sbyin dang ni mtshungs pas 'khyud //
T02TD1358E:106b-4: 'khor lo dang ni dbyug pa dag dang chu skyes dung dag 'dzin pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1358E:106b-5: nya nyi nri nyu nyli nyam /
T02TD1358E:106b-6: dzha dzhi dzhri dzhu dzhli dzham /
T02TD1358E:106b-7: dza dzi dzri dzu dzli dzam /
T02TD1358E:106b-8: tsha tshi tshri tshu tshli tsham /
T02TD1358E:106b-9: tsa tsi tsri tsu tsli tsam /
T02TD1358E:106b-10: rnams dang ral gri las byung pang gnas rnams //
T02TD1358E:106b-11: mnga' bdag dang mtshungs rol pas gnas pa dpal gyi dpyid zla 'bring po'i tshes rnams dang ni gtum mo'i tshogs kyi rang bzhin can de nyid do //
T02TD1358E:106b-12: 'di rnams dang bcas shar sgo'i g-yas su yi dags dang ni chu skyes dmar po'i steng gnas pa //
T02TD1358E:106b-13: tsam dang ral gri dag las byung ba'i srin po dmar mo dbang mo dang bcas ral gri gri gug dang //
T02TD1358E:106b-14: phub dang thod pa phyag gis 'dzin pa gang yin de la bdag nyid gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1358E:106b-15: na ni nri nu nli nam /
T02TD1358E:106b-16: dha dhi dhri dhu dhli dham /
T02TD1358E:106b-17: da di dri du dli dam /
T02TD1358E:106b-18: tha thi thri thu thli tham /
T02TD1358E:106b-19: ta ti tri tu tli tam /
T02TD1358E:106b-20: rnams dang shakti las byung pang gnas rnams ni mnga' bdag dang mtshungs rol pas gnas //
T02TD1358E:106b-21: dpal gyi dbyar zla ra ba'i tshes rnams dang ni lag mgo'i tshigs kyi rang bzhin gcig nyid de //
T02TD1358E:106b-22: 'di rnams dang bcas gshin rje phyogs kyi sgo yi g-yas su lug dang padma dmar po'i steng //
T02TD1358E:106b-23: gnas pa tv'am dang shakti las byung sreg za kha dog dmar po shakti dbyug pa dang //
T02TD1358E:106b-24: chu skyes spyi blugs dus kyi phyag na bsnams pa drag mos 'khyud pa de la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1358E:106b-25: ma mi mri mu mli mam /
T02TD1358E:106b-26: bha bhi bhri bhu bhli bham /
T02TD1358E:106b-27: ba bi bri bu bli bam /
T02TD1358E:106b-28: pha phi phri phu phli pham /
T02TD1358E:106b-29: pa pi pri pu pli pam /
T02TD1358E:106b-30: rnams dang zhags pa las byung par gnas rnams ni mnga' bdag dang mtshungs rol pas gnas //
T02TD1358E:106b-31: dpal gyi dbyar zla tha chungs tshes rnams dang ni dpyid mgo'i tshes kyi rang bzhin can nyid do //
T02TD1358E:106b-32: 'di rnams dang bcas byang sgo'i g-yas su chu srin dang ni padma dmar po'i steng na gnas //
T02TD1358E:106b-33: pam yig dang ni zhags pa dag las byung ba'i chu bdag zhags pa rin chen sprul nyid dang //
T02TD1358E:106b-34: nor bu rnams ni rig byed phyag na 'dzin cing phag mo dang bcas zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1358E:106b-35: na ni nri nu nli nam /
T02TD1358E:107a-2: da di dri du dli dam /
T02TD1358E:107a-3: tha thi thri thu thli tham /
T02TD1358E:107a-4: ta ti tri tu tli tam /
T02TD1358E:107a-5: rnams dang rdo rje las byung pang gnas rnams ni mnga' bdag dang mtshungs rol pas gnas //
T02TD1358E:107a-6: de ltar ston zla 'bring bo'i tshes rnams dang ni g-yon na rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin can //
T02TD1358E:107a-7: 'di rnams dang bcas nub sgo'i g-yas su sna thag can dang chu skyes dmar po'i steng gnas pa //
T02TD1358E:107a-8: tam yig dang ni rdo rje dag las byung ba'i dbang po ser po phyag na rdo rje dang //
T02TD1358E:107a-9: mda' dang dril bu gzhu rnams 'dzin pa tsa tsi k'a dang bcas pa de la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1358E:107a-10: thka thke thkri thku thkli thkam /
T02TD1358E:107a-11: shi shi shdi shu shli sham /
T02TD1358E:107a-12: sha shi shri shu shli sham /
T02TD1358E:107a-13: wa wi wri wu wli wam /
T02TD1358E:107a-14: sa si sri su sli sam /
T02TD1358E:107a-15: rnams dang rtse gsum las byung pang gnas rnams ni mnga' bdag dang mtshungs rol pas gnas //
T02TD1358E:107a-16: dgun zla ra ba'i tshes rnams dang ni long bu'i tshogs kyi rang bzhin can de 'di rnams dang //
T02TD1358E:107a-17: bcas pas byang sgo'i g-yon du khyu mchog dang ni chu skyes dmar po'i steng du yang dag gnas //
T02TD1358E:107a-18: sam yig dang ni rtse gsum las byung 'phrog byed sngon bo rtse gsum mda' dang kha tv'am ga / gzhu rnams phyag gis 'dzin dang gshin rje dang mtshungs ri yi bu mo bang gnas la phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1358E:107a-19: s'a s'i sr'i s'u sl'i s'a:/
T02TD1358E:107a-20: w'a w'i wr'i w'u wl'i w'am /
T02TD1358E:107a-21: sh'a sh'i shr'i sh'u shl'i sh'a:/
T02TD1358E:107a-22: sh'a sh'i shr'i sh'u shl'i sh'a:/
T02TD1358E:107a-23: thk'a thk'i thkr'i thk'u thkl'i thk'a:/
T02TD1358E:107a-24: rnams dang dbyug pa las byung bang gnas rnams ni mnga' bdag dang mtshungs rol pas gnas //
T02TD1358E:107a-25: de ltar dgun zla 'bring po'i tshes rnams dang ni rkang g-yas long mo'i tshigs kyi rang bzhin te /
T02TD1358E:107a-26: de rnams dang bcas nub sgo'i g-yon du ming dang nyi ma'i mdog ldan steng gnas pa //
T02TD1358E:107a-27: thk'a: yig dpal gyi dbyug pa dag las byung ba'i gnod sbyin nor bu dbyug pa sre mo dang //
T02TD1358E:107a-28: padma rnams ni phyag na 'dzin pa'i khyab 'jug dang mtshungs nor dbang pang gnas la phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1358E:107a-29: t'a t'i tr'i t'u tl'i t'a:/
T02TD1358E:107a-30: th'a th'i thr'i th'u thl'i th'a:/
T02TD1358E:107a-31: d'a d'i dr'i d'u dl'i d'a:/
T02TD1358E:107a-32: dh'a dh'i dhr'i dh'u dhl'i dh'a:/
T02TD1358E:107a-33: n'a n'i nr'i n'u nl'i n'a:/
T02TD1358E:107a-34: rnams dang dung las byung ba pang gnas rnams ni mnga' bdag dang mtshungs rol pas gnas //
T02TD1358E:107a-35: de ltar ston zla tha chungs tshes rnams dang ni pus mo'i tshigs kyi rang bzhin can nyid de //
T02TD1358E:107b-0: ngang pa chu skyes dkar po @107b la gnas n'a: yig dang ni dung las byung ba'i tshangs pa nyid //
T02TD1358E:107b-1: ser po dung dang phreng ba chu skyes spyi blugs rig byed phyag gis 'dzin la khyab 'jug mas //
T02TD1358E:107b-2: 'khyud pa'i zhal bzhi ser dang dkar dang dmar ba de la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1358E:107b-3: p'a p'i pr'i p'u pl'i p'a:/
T02TD1358E:107b-4: ph'a ph'i phr'i ph'u phl'i ph'a:/
T02TD1358E:107b-5: b'a b'i br'i b'u bl'i b'a:/
T02TD1358E:107b-6: bh'a bh'i bhr'i bh'u bhl'i bh'a:/
T02TD1358E:107b-7: m'a m'i mri m'u ml'i m'a:/
T02TD1358E:107b-8: rnams dang sta re las byung pang gnas rnams ni mnga' bdag dang mtshungs rol pas gnas //
T02TD1358E:107b-9: ston zla ra ba'i tshes rnams dang ni g-yas kyi dpyi mgo'i tshigs rnams rnam par dag pa yi //
T02TD1358E:107b-10: rang bzhin de rnams dang bcas dpang ldan mtshams su byi ba chu skyes dkar po'i steng gnas pa //
T02TD1358E:107b-11: m'a: yig sta re las byung tshogs bdag dkar bo steng gnas sta re rdo rje zhags ba nor bu rnams //
T02TD1358E:107b-12: phyag gis rim bzhin bsnams la gdong drug mas 'khyud de yi zhabs la rgyun du phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1358E:107b-13: t'a t'i tr'i t'u tl'i t'a:/
T02TD1358E:107b-14: th'a th'i thr'i th'u thl'i th'a:/
T02TD1358E:107b-15: d'a d'i dr'i d'u dl'i d'a:/
T02TD1358E:107b-16: dh'a dh'i dhr'i dh'u dhl'i dh'a:/
T02TD1358E:107b-17: n'a n'i nr'i n'u nl'i n'a:/
T02TD1358E:107b-18: rnams dang dung las byung ba pang gnas rnams ni mnga' bdag dang mtshungs rol pas gnas //
T02TD1358E:107b-19: dbyar zla 'bring po'i tshes rnams dang ni lag mgo'i tshigs kyi rang bzhin de rnams dang bcas pa //
T02TD1358E:107b-20: bden bral mtshams su rma bya chu skyes dkar po la gnas n'a: yig dang ni mdung dag las //
T02TD1358E:107b-21: byung ba'i ro yig gdong can dmar bo shakti dang ni mdung dang nor bu me long rnams //
T02TD1358E:107b-22: gang gi phyag na gnas pa dang ni dpa' mo dang bcas de la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1358E:107b-23: ts'a ts'i tsr'i ts'u tsl'i ts'a:/
T02TD1358E:107b-24: tsh'a tsh'i tshr'i tsh'u tshl'i tsh'a: dz'a dz'i dzr'i dz'u dzl'i dz'a:/
T02TD1358E:107b-25: dzh'a dzh'i dzhr'i dzh'u dzhl'i dzh'a:/
T02TD1358E:107b-26: ny'a ny'i nyr'i ny'u nyl'i ny'a:/
T02TD1358E:107b-27: rnams dang ljon shing las byung pang gnas rnams ni mnga' bdag dang mtshungs rol pas gnas //
T02TD1358E:107b-28: dpyid zla tha chungs tshes rnams dang ni gru mo'i tshigs kyis rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin te //
T02TD1358E:107b-29: de rnams dang bcas me yi mtshams su ri dags chu skyes dkar po la gnas ny'a: yig dang //
T02TD1358E:107b-30: ljon shing dag las byung ba'i rlung lha nag po phyag na ljon shing lha shing me tog dang //
T02TD1358E:107b-31: nor bu autpala sngon po rnams 'dzin rgya mtsho'i zhal ma pang gnas de la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1358E:107b-32: k'a k'i kar'i k'u kal'i k'a:/
T02TD1358E:107b-33: kh'a kh'i khar'i kh'u khal'i kh'a:/
T02TD1358E:108a-2: gh'a gh'i ghr'i gh'u ghl'i gh'a:/
T02TD1358E:108a-3: ng'a ng'i ngr'i ng'u ngl'i ng'a:/
T02TD1358E:108a-4: rnams dang dbyug pa las byung pang gnas rnams ni mnga' bdag dang mtshungs rol pas gnas //
T02TD1358E:108a-5: de ltar dpyid zla ra ba'i tshes rnams dang ni dpung pa'i tshigs kyi rang bzhin can nyid de //
T02TD1358E:108a-6: de rnams dang bcas lho sgo'i g-yon gyi phyogs su ma he chu skyes dmar po'i steng gnas pa //
T02TD1358E:108a-7: ng'a: yig dbyug pa las byung shin tu sngo ba dbyug pa ral gri lcags sgrog zhags pa rnams //
T02TD1358E:108a-8: dus kyi phyag gis 'dzin la 'phrog byed dang mtshungs gshin rje ma nyid par gnas la phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1358E:108a-9: khro rgyal rnams ni g-yas pa brkyang //
T02TD1358E:108a-10: lha mo rnams ni g-yon brkyang gnas //
T02TD1358E:108a-11: zhal gcig rgya mtsho phyag ldan zhing //
T02TD1358E:108a-12: spyan gsum rin chen cod pan can //
T02TD1358E:108a-13: ham yig dang ni rdo rje dag las lha dbang lus ldan phyag na rdo rje dang mtshungs gtsug tor can //
T02TD1358E:108a-14: de nyid pang gnas h'a: yig dang ni gri gug dag las byung ba'i shin tu sngon mo dus kyi phyag / gri gug rdo rje thod pa dril bu 'dzin pa dag ni steng du mkha' lding rlung gi shing rta la //
T02TD1358E:108a-15: yang dag gnas pa'i khu ba 'dzag pa'i rang bzhin de dag zhabs la rab tu dang bas phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1358E:108a-16: yam yig dbyug pa dag las byung ba'i khro bo dbyug sngon can de gshin rje'i dgra yi yum mtshungs dang //
T02TD1358E:108a-17: l'a: yig dang ni 'khor lo las byung 'od zer can ma gser mtshungs 'khor lo dbyug pa dung dang ni //
T02TD1358E:108a-18: rin po che rnams phyag gis padmas 'dzin pa dang bcas shar sgo'i dbus su phag pa bdun gyis drangs //
T02TD1358E:108a-19: shing rta la gnas dri chu rnam par dag pa de dag zhabs kyi padma la ni phyag 'tshal lo: / rmongs byed ma mtshungs r'am yig mda' dag las ni takki r'a dza //
T02TD1358E:108a-20: w'a: yig tho ba las byung tsunda sku mdog dkar mo len pa'i //
T02TD1358E:108a-21: rang bzhin tho ba mdung dang padma me long rnams 'dzin gshin rjer //
T02TD1358E:108a-22: rtas drangs shing rta la gnas de dag la ni rab tu phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1358E:108a-23: nga rgyal can mtshungs w'am yig gtun shing las byung mi g-yo ba ste //
T02TD1358E:108a-24: r'a: yig mda' dag las byung khro gnyer can ma 'gro ba'i rang bzhin //
T02TD1358E:108a-25: mda' dang lcags kyu gzhu dang zhags pa rnams ni phyag ldan dmar mo //
T02TD1358E:108a-26: byang du seng ge'i shing rta la gnas de dag la ni phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1358E:108b-0: rengs byed ma @108b mtshungs lam yig dbyug to dag las byung ba'i stobs chen //
T02TD1358E:108b-1: y'a: yig gtun shing las byung rdo rje lcags sgrog ma nyid nag mo //
T02TD1358E:108b-2: ral gri rdo rje dung dang dril bu rnams 'dzin bshad pa'i rang bzhin //
T02TD1358E:108b-3: chu ltar glang chen shing rta la gnas de dag la ni phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1358E:108b-4: kun du bzang mo dang mtshungs h'am yig dang ni dpal gyi gri gug las byung gnod mdzes dang //
T02TD1358E:108b-5: h'a: yig rdo rje las byung drag mig ma nyid ljang gu phyag gis sta re rtse gsum dang //
T02TD1358E:108b-6: sbrul zhags snying gar 'dzin cing kha tv'am ga bcas kyis 'khyud 'og tu klu yi lag ldan pa'i //
T02TD1358E:108b-7: shing rta la gnas bha ga dri chu'i rang bzhin rnam dag la ni phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1358E:108b-8: phyogs skyong dang mtshungs klu rnams kyis //
T02TD1358E:108b-9: dbu la gdengs ka lnga ru 'dod //
T02TD1358E:108b-10: 'on kyang rgyal ba rnam rgyal ni //
T02TD1358E:108b-12: h'um yig rdo rje las ni byung ba'i rgyal ba sku mdog ljang gu //
T02TD1358E:108b-13: bdud rtsi'i bum pa rdo rje chu skyes rin chen phyag rnams kun gyis //
T02TD1358E:108b-14: bzung ba rkang g-yon mthe chung rnam par dag pa sngon mo dang bcas //
T02TD1358E:108b-15: steng du nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor la gnas de dag la ni phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1358E:108b-16: sgo 'gram rnams su g-yo ba'i rtse mo can dang chu dang sa rnams dkyil 'khor so so'i kha dog gis //
T02TD1358E:108b-17: shar la sogs pa'i g-yon du dgod pa hya yig rgyal mtshan las byung karko ta nyid nag po ni //
T02TD1358E:108b-18: ming med rnam par dag pa ca spyang gdong mas 'khyud dang hram yig bkra shis las byung chu bdag nyid //
T02TD1358E:108b-19: nyi ma dang mtshungs gung mo rnam par dag pa stag gdong ma dang bcas la rim bzhin phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1358E:108b-20: hva yig chu skyes las byung dga' bo dkar po nyid //
T02TD1358E:108b-21: mdzub mo rnam par dag pa phag gdong mas 'khyud dang //
T02TD1358E:108b-22: hla yig 'khor lo las byung 'jog po ser po nyid //
T02TD1358E:108b-23: mthe bo rnam dag khyi gdong dang bcas la phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1358E:108b-24: nub sogs g-yas su hl'a yig 'khor lo las byung padma chen po ser po khva gdong bcas //
T02TD1358E:108b-25: h'a yig dag ni padma dag las byung ba'i rigs ldan dkar po bya rgod gdong bcas dang //
T02TD1358E:108b-26: hr'a yig bkra shis las byung ltos 'gro dung skyong dmar po 'ug gdong ma dang bcas pa dang //
T02TD1358E:109a-0: hy'a yig rgyal mtshan las byung padma dkar min bya khyung gdong bcas rnams @109a * //
T02TD1358E:109a-2: kshum yig rdo rje las byung rnam rgyal sngon po nyid //
T02TD1358E:109a-3: rkang pa g-yas pa'i mthe bo la sogs pa nyid kyi //
T02TD1358E:109a-4: rnam par dag pa rdo rje mig ma dang bcas pa //
T02TD1358E:109a-5: 'og tu ye shes la gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1358E:109a-6: lho sgo'i g-yon gyi 'dod yon la ni nges par gsal byed ka kha ga gha nga rnams thig le dang //
T02TD1358E:109a-7: bcas pa'i sa bon las byung mi 'dod ma rnams zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma ste mda' yi grangs rnams so //
T02TD1358E:109a-8: shar la sogs pa'i g-yas kyi 'dod yon rnams la tsa ta pa ta'i sde tshan rnams las rab tu byung //
T02TD1358E:109a-9: de ltar de rnams so so'i phyogs la lnga yi grangs kyi sa bon dang bcas so so'i phyag mtshan no //
T02TD1358E:109a-10: de ltar sa sde'i shar gyi g-yon //
T02TD1358E:109a-11: 'dod yon la ste ha ste byang //
T02TD1358E:109a-12: de las gzhan pa ksha yig las //
